S01divav33u:1_0: p.1.1/.evaṃ mayā śrutam/ ekasin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma/
S01divav33u:2_0: p.1.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ mahā^nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divav33u:2_1: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta^bhakta^kṛtyo yenānyatamam udapānaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divav33u:3_0: p.1.3/.tena khalu samayena tasminn udapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅga^dārikā udakam uddharate sma/
S01divav33u:3_1: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām etad avocat/
S01divav33u:4_0: p.1.4/.evaṃ kite prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:4_2: na^ahaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā pṛcchāmi/
S01divav33u:4_3: api tu sacette parityaktaṃ pānīyaṃ dehi pāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:5_0: p.1.5/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandāya pānīyam adāt/
S01divav33u:6_0: p.1.6/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmanta ānandsya śarīre mukhe svare sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhītvā yoniśo manasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṃrāgacittam utpādayati (1) sma/
S01divav33u:6_1: āryo me ānandaḥ svāmī ayād iti/
S01divav33u:6_2: mātā ca me mahā^vidyādharī sā śakṣyaty āryam ānandam ānayitum/
S01divav33u:7_0: p.2.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pānīyaghaṭam ādāya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkramya pānīya^ghaṭam ekānte nikṣipya svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
S01divav33u:8_0: p.2.2/.yat khalv evam amba jānīyā ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa^gautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakas tam ahaṃ svāminam icchāmi/
S01divav33u:9_0: p.2.3/.sā tām avocat/ śaktā +ahaṃ putri ānandam ānayituṃ/
S01divav33u:9_1: sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syād yo vā vīta^rāgaḥ/
S01divav33u:9_2: api ca rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇa^gautamam atīva sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
S01divav33u:10_0: p.2.4/.evam uktā prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā mātaram idam avocat/
S01divav33u:10_1: sa ced amba śramaṇo gautamā vīta^rāgastasya^antikāc chramaṇam ānandaṃ na pratilapsye jīvitaṃ parityajeyaṃ sa cet pratilipsye jīvāmi/
S01divav33u:11_0: p.2.5/.mā te putri jīvitaṃ parityajasi ānayāmi śramaṇam ānandam/
S01divav33u:12_0: p.2.6/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṃ kṛtvā vedīm ālipya darbhān saṃstīrya^agniṃ prajvālya^aṣṭaśatam arka^puṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā mantrān āvartayamānā ekaikam arka^puṣpaṃ parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma/
S01divav33u:13_0: p.3.1/.amale vimale kuṅkume sumane/ yena baddhā +asi vidyut/ icchayā devo varṣati vidyotati gajeti vismayaṃ mahā^rājasya samabhivardhāyituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyoḥ śikhi^grahā devā viśikhi^gra(@)hā devā ānandasya^āgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grahaṇāya juhomi svāhā/
S01divav33u:14_1: sa vihārān niṣkramya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāmati sma/
S01divav33u:15_0: p.3.3/.adrākṣīc caṇḍālī āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ dūrād eva^āgacchantaṃ/
S01divav33u:15_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaram idam avocat/
S01divav33u:15_2: ayam asau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati śayanaṃ prajñapaya/
S01divav33u:16_0: p.3.4/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā hṛṣṭa^tuṣṭā pramudita^manā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma/
S01divav33u:17_2: ekānta^sthitaḥ sa punar āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prārodīd/
S01divav33u:17_4: vyasana^prāpto +aham asmi na ca me bhagavān samanvāharati/
S01divav33u:18_0: p.3.6/.atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samanvāharati sma/
S01divav33u:21_0: p.4.1cd/.ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca/
S01divav33u:22_0: p.4.2ab/.tad vai devā namsyanti sarva^siddhāś ca yoginaḥ/
S01divav33u:24_0: p.4.3/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pratihata^caṇḍāla^mantraś caṇḍāla^gṛhān niṣkramya yena svako vihāras tena^upasaṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ/
S01divav33u:25_1: ānandam āyuṣmantaṃ pratigacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
S01divav33u:25_2: ayam asau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/
S01divav33u:25_3: tām āha mātā/ niyataṃ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/
S01divav33u:25_5: prakṛtir āha/ kiṃ punar amba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā na^asmākaṃ/
S01divav33u:25_6: tām āha mātā/ balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā na^asmākaṃ/
S01divav33u:25_7: ye putri mantāḥ sarva^lokasya prabhavanti tān mantrān śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti/
S01divav33u:25_8: na punar lokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantuṃ/
S01divav33u:27_0: p.4.6/.ekānta^sthitam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavān idam avocat/
S01divav33u:27_1: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīvidyāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
S01divav33u:27_2: ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upasikānāṃ hitāya sukhāya/
S01divav33u:27_3: iyam ānanda ṣaḍkṣarīvidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyak saṃbuddhair bhāṣitā caturbhiś ca mahā^rājaiḥ śakreṇa devānām indreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā/
S01divav33u:27_5: tvam apy etarhy ānanda tāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
S01divav33u:28_0: p.5.1/.aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre +arci^haste khara^grīve bandhu^mati cīra^mati dharavidha cilimile viloḍaya viṣāṇi loke/
S01divav33u:28_1: viṣa cala cala/ gola^mati gaṇḍavile cilimile sa^atinimne yathā saṃvibhakta^gola^mati gaṇḍa^vilāyai svāhā/
S01divav33u:29_0: p.5.2/.yaḥ kaś cid ānanda^ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ kuryāt sa yadi vadha^arho bhavet daṇḍena mucyate/
S01divav33u:29_1: daṇḍa^arhaḥ prahāreṇa prahāra^arhaḥ paribhāṣaṇayā paribhāṣaṇa^arho romaharṣaṇena romaharṣaṇa^arhaḥ punar eva mucyate/
S01divav33u:30_0: p.5.3/.na^aham ānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sa^deva^loke samāra^loke sabrahma^loke saśramaṇa^brāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sa^deva^mānuṣikāyāṃ sa^asurāyāṃ yas tv anayā ṣaḍakṣayaṃ vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ rakṣā^sūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte +abhibhavituṃ śakroti varjayitvā paurāṇaṃ karma^vipākam/
S01divav33u:31_0: p.6.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥ^snātā +anāhata dūṣya^prāvṛtā muktā^mālya^ābharaṇā yena śrāvasto nagarī tena^upasaṃkramya nagara^dvāre kapāṭa^mūle niśrityā +asthāt/
S01divav33u:32_0: p.6.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divav33u:32_2: dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
S01divav33u:32_3: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati āyuṣmantam
S01divav33u:33_1: pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīymāṇarūpo +apragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṃ tanopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divav33u:33_3: ekānta^sthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:33_4: prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati,
S01divav33u:33_5: tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/ yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśāmi tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati/
S01divav33u:33_6: trāhi me bhagavan trāhi me sugata/
S01divav33u:34_0: p.6.4/.evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:34_1: mā bher mā bher iti/ atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/
S01divav33u:34_2: hiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅga^dārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā/
S01divav33u:34_3: prakṛtir āha/ svāminaṃ bhadantam ānandam icchāmi/
S01divav33u:34_4: bhagavān āha/ (7) anujñātāsi prakṛte mātāpitṛbhyām ānandāya/
S01divav33u:35_0: p.7.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntā/
S01divav33u:35_3: ekānta^sthitā svakau mātā pitarāv idam avocat/
S01divav33u:36_0: p.7.2/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtim ādāya yana bhagavāms tena^upasaṃkrāntau/
S01divav33u:36_1: uapsaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte nyaṣīdatāṃ/
S01divav33u:36_2: atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā banditvā ekānte +asthād/
S01divav33u:37_0: p.7.3/.atha bhagavān prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv idam avoct/
S01divav33u:37_2: tāv āhutuḥ/ anujñātā bhagavann anujñātā sugata/
S01divav33u:37_3: tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtim apahāya gacchata svagṛham/
S01divav33u:38_0: p.7.4/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntau/
S01divav33u:39_0: p.7.5/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv aciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idm avocat/
S01divav33u:39_2: prakṛtir āha/ arthikāsmi bhagavann arthikāsmi sugata/
S01divav33u:39_3: tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veśaḥ sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:39_4: sā āha/ dhārayāmi bhagavan dhārayāmi sugata/
S01divav33u:40_0: p.8.1/.atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/ ehi tvaṃ bhikṣuṇi cara brahma^caryam/
S01divav33u:41_0: p.8.2/.evam ukte prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavatā muṇḍā kāṣāya^prāvṛtā/
S01divav33u:41_1: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām ehi bhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma,
S01divav33u:41_2: samādāpayati sma, samuttejayati sma, saṃpraharṣayati sma/ yeyaṃ kathā dīrgha^rātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā/
S01divav33u:41_3: tad yathā/ dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmeṣv
S01divav33u:41_4: ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ bodhipakṣāṃs tān dharmān bhagvān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divav33u:42_0: p.8.3/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyaya kathayā saṃdarśitā samādāpitā samuttejitā saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭa^cittā kalyāṇacittā muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittā +akhilacittā bhavyā dharma^deśitam ājñātum/
S01divav33u:43_0: p.9.1/.yadā ca bhagavān jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭa^cittāṃ kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ vinivaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ sāmutkarpikīṃ dharma^deśanām ājñātuṃ tadā yeyaṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ caturārya^satyaprativedhikī sāmutkarṣikī dharma^deśanā,
S01divav33u:43_1: yad uta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ,
S01divav33u:43_2: tāṃ bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divav33u:44_0: p.9.2/.atha prakṛtibhikṣuṇī tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyānyabhijñātāsit/
S01divav33u:44_2: / tad yathā vastām apagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅga^udake prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇīyād evam eva prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyāni abhisamayati sma,
S01divav33u:44_3: tad yathā duḥkhaṃ sumudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgam/
S01divav33u:45_0: p.9.3/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī kṛṣṭa^dharmā prāpta^dharmā vidita^dharmā akopya^dharmā paryavasita^dharma^adhigata^artha^lābha^saṃvṛttā tīrṇa^kāṅkṣā^vicikitsā vigata^kathaṃkathā vaiśāradya^prāptā +apara^pratyayā +ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane +anudharma^cāriṇī ājāneyamānā dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:46_0: p.9.4/.atyayo me bhagavann atyayo me sugata/
S01divav33u:46_1: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīyā yāham ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena samudācarṣaṃ/
S01divav33u:46_4: atyayam atyayata āviṣkaromi/ āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadye/ atas tasyā mama bhagavann atyayam atyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu
S01divav33u:46_5: anukampām upādāya/ bhagavān āha/ āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya sthitvā tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayam atyayato +adhyāgamaḥ/
S01divav33u:46_6: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīya tvam ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena (10) amudācarasi^iti/
S01divav33u:46_7: yataś ca tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayaṃ jānāsi atyayaṃ paśyasi āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaram āpadyase,
S01divav33u:46_9: eva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣatavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ/
S01divav33u:47_0: p.10.1/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā^abhinanditā anuśiṣṭā ekāvyapakṛṣṭā +apramattā ātāpinī smṛtim atī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati sma/
S01divav33u:47_1: yad arthaṃ kula^duhitaraḥ keśān avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā^āgārād anāgārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttara^brahmacarya^paryavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñaya sākṣāt kṛtya^upasaṃpadya
S01divav33u:47_2: pravedayate sma/ kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ na^aparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi^iti/
S01divav33u:48_0: p.10.2/.aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatayo bhagavatā kila canḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
S01divav33u:48_2: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divav33u:48_4: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā brahma^kṣatriya^gṛhapati^mahā^śāla^kuleṣu pravekṣyati/
S01divav33u:49_0: p.11.1/.aśrauṣīd rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatā caṇḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
S01divav33u:49_1: śrutvā ca punar avadhyāyāti/ kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyak^caryāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divav33u:50_0: p.11.2/.vimṛṣya ca bhadaraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānam abhiruhya saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvasteyair brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma/
S01divav33u:50_2: tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā sa yānād avatīrya pattikāya^parivṛtaḥ pattikāya^puraskṛtaḥ padbhyām eva^ārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
S01divav33u:50_4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:50_5: te +api saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^kṣatirya^gṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:50_6: apy aikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:50_9: apy aikatya yena bhagavāṃs tena^añjaliṃ praṇamya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:50_10: apy aikatyās tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:51_0: p.11.3/.atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam ārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvasteyakānāṃ brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^gṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsam ārabhya bhikṣūnām antrayate sma/
S01divav33u:51_1: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathā^āgatasya sammukhaṃ prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ śrotum/
S01divav33u:52_0: p.11.4/.bhikṣavo bhagavantam āhuḥ / etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ kathāyet/
S01divav33u:52_2: bhagavān āha/ tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye/
S01divav33u:52_3: evaṃ sādhu bhagavann iti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/
S01divav33u:53_0: p.12.1/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ bhikṣavo +atīte +adhvani gaṅgā^taṭe +atimukta^kadalī^pāṭalaka^āmalakī vana^gahana^pradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājaḥ prativasati sma/
S01divav33u:53_2: sa punar bhikṣavas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rajaḥ pūrva^janma^adhītān vedān samanusmarati sma sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān
S01divav33u:53_4: padako vaiyākaraṇo lokāyata^yajña^mantre mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣo bhāṣyaṃ ca yathārdharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāny anuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate sma/
S01divav33u:54_0: p.12.2/.tasya triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājasya śārdūakarṇo nāma kumāro +abhūd utpannaḥ/
S01divav33u:54_1: rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca sarva^guṇaiś ca^upeto +abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubha^varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divav33u:55_0: p.12.3/.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājaḥ/śārdūlakarṇaṃ kumāraṃ pūrva^janmādhītān vedān adhyāpayati sma/
S01divav33u:55_1: yad uta sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān itihāsa^pañca^mānanyāni ca śāstrāṇi bhāṣyaṃ ca yathā^dharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāni/
S01divav33u:56_1: ayaṃ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumāraḥ/
S01divav33u:56_2: upeto rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
S01divav33u:56_3: sarva^guṇa^upeto +abhirūpo (13) darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā ca varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divav33u:56_5: samayo +ayaṃ yan ny aham asya niveśana^dharmaṃ kariṣye/
S01divav33u:56_6: avaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ rūpavatīṃ pratirūpāṃ prajāvatīṃ labheyam iti/
S01divav33u:57_0: p.13.1/.tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sma/
S01divav33u:57_1: samapta^utsadaṃ sa^tṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
S01divav33u:58_0: p.13.2/.puṣkarasārī punar brāhmaṇa upetaḥ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyāmanākṣipto jātivādena gotra^vādena yāvad āsaptamamātāmahapitāmahaṃ/
S01divav33u:58_1: yugapad upādhyāyo +adhyāpako mantra^dharas trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragaḥ sa^aṅga^upāṅgānāṃ sarahasyānāṃ sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhānāṃ sa^akṣara^prabhedānām itihāsa^pañca^mānāṃ sadṛśa^vyākartā padako vaiyākaraṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:58_2: lokāyata^yajña^mantra^mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇeṣu pāragaḥ/ sphītam utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhuṅkte/
S01divav33u:59_0: p.13.3/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
S01divav33u:59_1: upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
S01divav33u:59_2: sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī/
S01divav33u:60_3: upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛto (14) yāvat tatraivedike pravacane vistareṇa/
S01divav33u:60_5: sasapta^utsadaṃ satṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^bhogaiḥ sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
S01divav33u:61_0: p.14.1/.tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā/
S01divav33u:61_1: śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatiti/
S01divav33u:62_0: p.14.2/.atra triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja etam evārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣa^kāla^samaye sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya mahatā śvapākagaṇenāmātyagaṇena parivṛtaś caṇḍāla^kula^nagarān niṣkramya^uttarena prāgacchadyenotkūṭaṃ droṇa^mukham/
S01divav33u:63_0: p.14.3/.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja utkūṭasya^uttarapūrveṇa sumanaskaṃ nāma^udyānaṃ nānā^vṛkṣa^saṃcchannaṃ nānā^vṛkṣa^kusumitaṃ nānā^dvijanikūjitaṃ nandanam iva devānāṃ tad upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divav33u:63_2: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitum ihāgamiṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:64_0: p.14.4/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya śiṣyagaṇaprivṛtaḥ pañca^mātrair māṇavaka^śateḥ puraskṛta utkūṭān niryti sma,
S01divav33u:65_0: p.15.1/.adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ sūryam iva^udayantaṃ tejasā jvalantam iva hutavahaṃ yajñam iva brāhmaṇa^parivṛtaṃ śakram iva deva^gaṇaparivṛtaṃ haimavantam ivauṣadhibhiḥ samudram iva ratnaiś candram iva nakṣatrair vaiśravaṇam iva yakṣa^gaṇair brahmāṇam iva deva^rṣigaṇaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śobhamānaṃ/
S01divav33u:66_1: kāryaṃ ca te vakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:66_2: evam ukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkumātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:67_0: p.15.3/.na hi bhos triśaṅko śakyaṃ brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
S01divav33u:68_0: p.15.4/.ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śaknomi bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
S01divav33u:68_1: yacchakyaṃ me kartuṃ bhavati naiva tacchakyaṃ te kartuṃ/
S01divav33u:68_2: api tu catvāro bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kāryasamārambhāḥ pūrva^samārabdhā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:68_3: yad uta ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vātmīyārthaṃ (16) vā sarva^bhūta^saṃgrahārthaṃ vā/
S01divav33u:68_4: idaṃ ca^atra mahattaraṃ kāryaṃ yat te vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:68_5: me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
S01divav33u:69_0: p.16.1/.idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bhṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca kveṣaṃ ca mrakṣyaṃ ca tatpratyayāt saṃjanayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dṛṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:70_0: p.16.2/.dhig grāmyaviṣaya/ caṇḍāla/ nedaṃ śvapākavacanaṃ yuktaṃ/ yastvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ veda^pāragaṃ hīnaś caṇḍāla^yonijo bhūtvā icchasy avamardituṃ/
S01divav33u:71_0: p.16.3ab/.prakṛtiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi; ātmānaṃ ca^abhimanyase/
S01divav33u:72_0: p.16.3cd/.bāla^agre sarṣapaṃ mā bho sthāpaya(mā)kleśam āgamaḥ/

S01divav33u:77_0: p.17.2cd/.hīnaḥ śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ mūḍha prāthayase kathaṃ//

S01divav33u:118_0: p.19.5ab/.mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca^eva bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:119_0: p.19.5cd/.putraṃ duhitaraṃ bhāryāṃ dvijā na prokṣayanty amī//

S01divav33u:121_0: p.19.6cd/.prokṣitās te +api vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sadgatiṃ//
S01divav33u:122_0: p.19.7ab/.sarve yajñaiḥ samāhutā gamiṣyanti satāṃ gatiṃ/
S01divav33u:123_0: p.19.7cd/.paśubhiḥ kiṃ nu bho yaṣṭair ātmānaṃ kiṃ na yakṣyase//

S01divav33u:137_0: p.20.5ab/.na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ hy ekaṃ hanyād anyān anekaśaḥ/

S01divav33u:143_0: p.20.7ef/.āsanaṃ ca^udakaṃ ca^eva vyutthānaṃ sa na ca^arhati//

S01divav33u:152_1: saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad idam ucyate brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra ity vā/

S01divav33u:152_5: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca catpratyayaṃ janayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ (22) dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dūṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
S01divav33u:154_0: p.22.1cd/.ekaiva jātir loke +asmin sāmānyā na pṛthag^vidhā//
S01divav33u:157_1: tad yathā deśa^dharme vā nagara^dharme vā grāma^dharme vā nigamadhama vā śulka^dharme vā āvāha^dharme vā vivāha^dharme vā pūrva^karmasu vā/
S01divav33u:157_2: catvāra ime vṛṣala varṇāḥ/ yad uta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divav33u:157_3: teṣāṃ vivāha^dharmeṣu catasro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya bhavanti/
S01divav33u:157_4: vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/ tisraḥ kṣatriyasya bhāryā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:157_5: kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/ vaiśyasya dve bhārye bhavataḥ/
S01divav33u:157_6: vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/ śūdrasya av ekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva/
S01divav33u:157_7: evaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:157_8: tad yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ceti/
S01divav33u:157_9: śūdra iti/ śūdrasya tv eka eva putro bhavati yad uta śūdra eva/
S01divav33u:158_0: p.22.4/.te brāhmaṇāḥ punar vṛṣala brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ/
S01divav33u:159_0: p.22.5/.brahmaṇā^ayaṃ khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni nirmitāni/
S01divav33u:160_0: p.23.1ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
S01divav33u:162_0: p.23.2/.sa tvaṃ vṛṣala caturthe +api varṇe na saṃdṛśyase/
S01divav33u:162_1: ahaṃ ca^agre varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe/
S01divav33u:162_2: paramārthaṃ ca saṃyogamākāṅkṣasi praṇaśya tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ /
S01divav33u:163_0: p.23.3/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
S01divav33u:163_1: idam atra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yad bravīmi/
S01divav33u:164_0: p.23.4ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
S01divav33u:166_0: p.23.5ab/.sapāda^jaṅghāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsāḥ sapārśvapṛṣṭhāś ca narā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:167_0: p.23.5cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
S01divav33u:168_0: p.23.6ab/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravatosti kaścit tad brūhi yac ca^anumataṃ yathā te/
S01divav33u:169_0: p.23.6cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro hi nāsti varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
S01divav33u:170_0: p.24.1ab/. yathā hi dāurukā bālāḥ krīḍamānā mahā^pathe/
S01divav33u:172_0: p.24.2ab/.idaṃ kṣīram idaṃ dadhi; idaṃ māṃsam idaṃ ghṛtaṃ/
S01divav33u:173_0: p.24.2cd/.na ca bālasya vacanāt pāṃśavo +annaṃ bhavanti hi//
S01divav33u:174_0: p.24.3ab/.varṇās tathāiva catvāro yathā brāhmaṇa bhāṣase/
S01divav33u:175_0: p.24.3cd/.pāṃśupuñjābhidhānena yogo [yaḥ ko] py eṣa na vidyate//
S01divav33u:176_0: p.24.4ab/.na keśena na karṇābhyāṃ na śīrṣaṇa na cakṣuṣā/
S01divav33u:177_0: p.24.4cd/.na mukhena na nāsayā na grīvaya na bāhunā//
S01divav33u:180_0: p.24.6ab/.na svareṇa na varṇena na sarvāṃśair na maithunaiḥ/
S01divav33u:182_0: p.24.7ab/.yathā hi jātiṣv anyāsu liṅgaṃ yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
S01divav33u:183_0: p.24.7cd/.sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ vā jātiṣu manyase//
S01divav33u:184_0: p.24.8ab/.saśīrṣakāś ca^atha narāsthi^yuktāḥ sacarmakāḥ sendriyasodarāś ca/
S01divav33u:185_0: p.24.8cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇā na yuktāś caturo +abhidhātuṃ//
S01divav33u:186_0: p.24.9ab/.athāsti kaścit pravaro viśeṣas tad brūhi yaccānumataṃ yathā te/
S01divav33u:187_0: p.24.9cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro +atra nāsti varṇā na yuktāś caturobhidhātuṃ//
S01divav33u:188_0: p.25.1ab/.doṣo hy ayaṃ ca^atra bhaved ayukto yad yat tvayā ca^abhihitaṃ nidāne/
S01divav33u:189_0: p.25.1cd/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yac ca^atra manye śṛṇucodyamānaṃ//
S01divav33u:190_0: p.25.2ab/.yac ca^atra yuktaṃ viṣamaṃ samaṃ vā tāt te pravakṣyāmi niyujyamānaḥ/
S01divav33u:191_0: p.25.2cd/.doṣo hi yaś ca^api bhaved ayukto vakṣyāmi te hy uttarata^uttaraṃ ca/
S01divav33u:192_0: p.25.3ef/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karma^adhipatyaprabhavā manuṣyāḥ//
S01divav33u:193_0: p.25.4/.anumānam api te brāhmaṇa yadi pramāṇaṃ,
S01divav33u:193_1: tatra yad bravīṣi brahmā eka iti tasmāt prajā api eka^jātyā eva/
S01divav33u:193_3: yac ca vravīṣi brahmaṇā^ayaṃ lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni ca nirmitāni^iti/
S01divav33u:193_5: tad idaṃ te brāhmaṇa ayuktaṃ yad bravīṣi catvāro varṇā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrāś ceti/
S01divav33u:194_0: p.25.4/.api tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vaco bhavet yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena munuṣyajāter nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:194_1: yad uta śīrṣato vā mukhato vā karṇato vā nāsikāto vā (26) bhrūto vā rūpato vā saṃsthānato vā varṇato vā ''kārato vā yonito vā ''hārato vā sambhāvato vā nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:195_0: p.26.1/.tad yathā^api bhoḥ puṣkarasārin gavāś ca gardabho ṣṭramṛgapakṣyajaiḍakā^nāmaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaupapādukānāṃnānā^karanaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:195_1: yad uta pādato +api mukhatopi varṇato +api saṃsthānato +api āhārato +api yonisambhavato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate naca^evaṃ teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:195_2: tat tasmāt sarvam idam ekam iti/
S01divav33u:196_1: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:196_2: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:197_0: p.26.3/.tad yathā brāhmaṇāmīṣāṃ sthalajānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ sāratamālanaktamālakarṇikārassaptaparṇaśirīṣakovidārasyandanacandanaśiṃśapairaṇḍakhadira^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:198_0: p.26.4/.yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca viśeṣa upalabhyate/
S01divav33u:198_1: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:199_0: p.26.5/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn amīṣāṃ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām udumbaraplakṣāśvatthanyagrodhavalgukety evam ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:199_1: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvag bhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:199_2: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:200_0: p.26.6/.tad yathā puṣkarasārinn amīṣām api phalabaiṣajyavṛkṣāṇām āmalakīharītakīvibhītakī pharasaka^ādīnām anyāsām api vividhānām oṣadhīnāṃ grāma^jānāṃ pārvatīyānāṃ tṛṇa^vanaspatīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:200_1: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca (27) gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:201_0: p.27.1/.tad yathā sthalajānāṃ puṣpa^vṛkṣāṇām atimuktaka^campaka^pāṭalānāṃ sumanā vārṣikādhanaṣkārika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:201_1: yad uto rūpato +api varṇato +api gandhato +api saṃsthānato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:201_2: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:202_0: p.27.2/.tad yathā brāhmaṇām īṣām api jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ padma^utpala^saugandhika^mṛdu^gandhika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:202_1: yad uta rūpataś ca gandhataś ca saṃsthānataś ca vaṇataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:202_3: tad yathā puṣkarasārin amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/
S01divav33u:203_0: p.27.3ab/.apy anyat te pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ kalpitaṃ yath/ā/
S01divav33u:204_0: p.27.3cd/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā//
S01divav33u:205_0: p.27.4ab/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ/
S01divav33u:207_0: p.27.5ab/.aśrūṇy avocad varṣā +asya nadyaḥ prasrāvam eva ca/
S01divav33u:208_0: p.27.5cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai; evaṃ brahmā prajāpatiḥ//
S01divav33u:209_1: yasmād brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā utpannās tasmāt kṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apy utpannāḥ/
S01divav33u:210_0: p.28.2ab/.evaṃ prasūtir yadi tatvataḥ syāt tato hi syād varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divav33u:211_0: p.28.2cd/.yadi brāhmaṇā brahma^lokaṃ vrajeyus trayaś ca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ svargaṃ/
S01divav33u:212_0: p.28.2ef/.evaṃ bhaved varṇa^kṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//
S01divav33u:213_0: p.28.3ab/.yasmād dhi varṇaś caturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena karmaṇā/
S01divav33u:214_0: p.28.3cd/.yatas tapaś ca^ārṣam iha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ syād//
S01divav33u:215_0: p.28.4ab/.yadi brāhmaṇaḥ syād ihaika eva dvijihvaś catuḥ^śravaṇas tathā^eva/
S01divav33u:216_0: p.28.4cd/.catur^viṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ//
S01divav33u:217_0: p.29.1ab/.rāgaiś ca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evaṃ prakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
S01divav33u:218_0: p.29.1cd/.sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etāny akalyāṇakṛtāni vipraiḥ//
S01divav33u:219_0: p.29.2ab/.yuddhaṃ vivādṃ kalahāny abhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇair hi/
S01divav33u:219_1: p.29.2cd/.atharvaṇaḥ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//
S01divav33u:220_0: p.29.3ab/.pāpecchatā bahu^jana^vañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhaurtyaṃ ca tathā^eva kalpaṃ/
S01divav33u:221_0: p.29.3cd/.evaṃ pareṣām ahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargam ito vrajeyuḥ//
S01divav33u:222_0: p.29.4ab/.ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hy upetāḥ/
S01divav33u:223_0: p.29.4cd/.ahiṃsakā ye dama saṃyame ratās te brāhmaṇā brahma^puraṃ vrajanti//
S01divav33u:224_0: p.29.5ab/.saha^asthi^māṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtra^purīṣam ekaṃ/
S01divav33u:225_0: p.29.5cd/.pañca^indriyair nāsti yato viśeṣas tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eṣaḥ//
S01divav33u:226_0: p.29.6/.tad yathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasya^cit puruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divav33u:226_1: sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryān nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyur iti vā /
S01divav33u:226_2: iṣṭāś ca (30) punar bho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divav33u:226_3: tatra yo nandakaḥ sa nandet/ yo jīvakaḥ sa īvet/ yo +aśokaḥ sa na śocet/ yaḥ śatāyuḥ sa varṣaśataṃ jīvet/
S01divav33u:227_0: p.30.1/.nāmataḥ punar brāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
S01divav33u:227_1: tatkasya hetoḥ/ iha khalu punar brāhmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyte/
S01divav33u:228_0: p.30.2ab/.mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
S01divav33u:229_0: p.30.2cd/.yady evaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā) parabhūtāḥ kvacit//
S01divav33u:230_0: p.30.3/.parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa saṃyageva ko +atra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūtra iti/
S01divav33u:231_0: p.30.4ab/.sarve kāṇāś ca kubjāś ca sarve +apasmāriṇopi vā/
S01divav33u:232_0: p.30.4cd/.kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaś ca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//
S01divav33u:233_0: p.30.5/.pratiṣṭhitāḥ samamajjānakhatvacapārśva^udaravaktrāḥ prajā hi tāḥ svakarmaṇā/
S01divav33u:233_1: evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ/
S01divav33u:234_0: p.30.6/.yasmān na jāter viśeṣaṇo +asti tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eva/
S01divav33u:235_0: p.31.1/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātram idaṃ lokasya yad idaṃ brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāla iti vā/
S01divav33u:235_1: ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/ putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:236_0: p.31.2/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārīdam avocat/
S01divav33u:236_2: yajurvedo +adhītaḥ, sāmavedo +adhītaḥ, atharvavedo +adhītaḥ, āyurvedo +adhītaḥ kalpādhyāyo pi/
S01divav33u:236_3: adhyātmam api mṛgacakraṃ vā nakṣatra^gaṇo vā tithi^kramagaṇo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
S01divav33u:236_7: athavā rāhucairtaṃ vā śukra^caritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ vā tvayādhītaṃ/
S01divav33u:236_8: athavā lokāyateṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
S01divav33u:237_0: p.32.1/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāhaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇam etad avocat/
S01divav33u:237_1: etac ca mayā brāhmaṇādhītaṃ bhūyaś ca^uttaraṃ /
S01divav33u:237_2: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād aham asmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti/
S01divav33u:237_3: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divav33u:237_4: na khalv evaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
S01divav33u:237_5: yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya
S01divav33u:237_6: iti vā śūdra iti vā/ ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/
S01divav33u:238_0: p.32.2/.atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ ca^ubhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato +anye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā/
S01divav33u:238_2: athātra brāhmaṇa tad anyatamānāṃ sattānām etad abhavat/
S01divav33u:238_3: parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
S01divav33u:238_5: tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇa^kuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyena iti/
S01divav33u:239_0: p.32.3/.atha te sattvās taṃ svakaṃ parigraham apahāyāraṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapalāśakais tṛṇa^kuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra^eva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/
S01divav33u:239_1: te tatra sāyam āsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetoś ca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma/
S01divav33u:240_0: p.32.4/.atha teṣāṃ grāma^vāsināṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
S01divav33u:240_1: duṣkarakārakā vata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigraham utṛjya grāma^nigamajana^padebhyo bahir nirgatās teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhyaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:240_2: te ca punar grāma^vāsinaḥ sattvās tān atīva satkurvanti sma/
S01divav33u:241_0: p.33.1/.atha teṣām eva sattvānām anyatame sattvās tāni dhyānāny asaṃbhāvayanto grāmeṣv avatīrya mantra^padān svādhyāyanti sma/
S01divav33u:241_1: tāṃs te grāma^nivāsina āhuḥ --- na levalam ime sattvā ime +adhyāpakāḥ,
S01divav33u:241_2: teṣām adhyāpakā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:242_0: p.33.2/.ayaṃ hetur ayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya/
S01divav33u:242_1: athānyatame sattvā viveka^kāla^pratisaṃyuktān karma^antān vividhān artha^pratisaṃyuktān kurvanti sma/
S01divav33u:243_0: p.33.3/.athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
S01divav33u:244_0: p.33.4/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhamṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūm ādāya ratham āruhyānyatam asminn araṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
S01divav33u:244_1: tatra ca ratho bhagnaḥ/ tasmān mātaṅgama [mā tvaṃ gamaḥ] iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:245_0: p.33.5/.kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā prvṛttā/
S01divav33u:245_1: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlabratasamācāreṇa samyak,
S01divav33u:246_0: p.33.6/.tato +anye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā (34) udapādi/
S01divav33u:246_2: pravrajitvā parān jayanti kleśān jayanti^iti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divav33u:247_0: p.34.1/.api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/ tāṃ te pravakṣyāmi/
S01divav33u:248_6: śukaḥ paṇḍitaś ca vedān vibhajati sma/
S01divav33u:248_7: tad yathā puṣyo bahv^ṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chantogānām eka^viṃśatir adhvaryavaḥ/
S01divav33u:248_8: kratur artha^vaṇikānāṃ/ bahv^ṛcānām ete brāhmaṇāḥ/ sarve te vyākhyāyante/ puṣya eko bhūtvā pañca^viṃśatidhā bhinnaḥ/
S01divav33u:248_9: tad yathā śuklā valkalā māṇḍavyā iti/
S01divav33u:248_10: tatra daśa śuklāḥ/ aṣṭau valkalāḥ/ sapta māṇḍavyāḥ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa bahv^ṛcānāṃ śākhā/
S01divav33u:249_2: paṃktir ety ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti^sahasradhā bhinnā/
S01divav33u:249_3: tad yathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahma^samā mahā^samā mahā^yāgikāḥ sa^atyam ugrāḥ samanta^vedāḥ/
S01divav33u:250_0: p.36.1/.tatra śīlavalkā viṃśatiḥ/ araṇemikā viṃśatiḥ/ laukākṣāś catvāriṃśat/ kauthumānāṃ śataṃ/ brahma^samānāṃ śataṃ/ mahā^samānāṃ pañca^śatāni/ mahā^yāgikānāṃ śataṃ/ sa^atyam ugrāṇāṃ śataṃ / samanta^vedānāṃ śataṃ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa^chandogānāṃ śākhā/
S01divav33u:250_1: paṃktir ity ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti sahasradhā bhinnā/
S01divav33u:251_1: ete brāhmaṇā eka^viṃśaty adhvaryavo bhūtvā eka^uttaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
S01divav33u:251_2: tad yathā kaṭhāḥ kaṃinā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ proṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:251_3: tatra daśa kaṭhā daśa kaṇimā ekādaśa vājasaneyinaḥ/
S01divav33u:251_4: trayodaśa jātukarnāḥ/ ṣoḍaśa proṣṭhapadāḥ/ eka catvāriṃśad ṛṣayaḥ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇādhvaryūṇāṃ śākhā/
S01divav33u:253_0: p.36.4/.anumānam api brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśa^bhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāś ca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divav33u:253_1: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokāyate vā (37) padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā na caiṣāmūhāpohaḥ prajñāyate/
S01divav33u:253_2: yad uta eka^jātyo nāmeti viditvā bandhur bhavitum arhati/
S01divav33u:253_3: tat te vrāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam etal lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya
S01divav33u:253_4: iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divav33u:253_5: ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/ putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:254_0: p.37.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tuṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo +asthāt/
S01divav33u:255_0: p.37.2/.dadarśa triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tṛṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srasta^skandham adhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/
S01divav33u:255_2: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād asadṛśena saha sambandho bhaviṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:255_4: (38)tat kasya hetoḥ/ ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlapraññādayo guṇā agyrā
S01divav33u:255_5: lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
S01divav33u:255_6: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt --- ye vājapiyaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti/
S01divav33u:255_7: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti,
S01divav33u:255_8: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svarga^loke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
S01divav33u:255_10: tat kasya hetoḥ/vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñaṃ yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ
S01divav33u:255_11: śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
S01divav33u:255_12: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
S01divav33u:255_13: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhāmi/
S01divav33u:257_0: p.38.1cd/.praśaṃsāṃ vitta^lābhaṃ ca pretya svarge ca modanaṃ//
S01divav33u:258_0: p.38.2/.yair brāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ/
S01divav33u:258_1: yair aśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣa^medho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divav33u:258_2: parigṛhītas tair nirargalaṃ ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ/
S01divav33u:258_3: ito nākaḥ paryeṣyate/ ye brāhmaṇa itaḥ paścād vājapeyaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti ye +aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti te nirarthakaṃ mahā^vighātaṃ saṃyokṣyanti/
S01divav33u:259_0: p.38.3/.tasmāt te brāhmana bravīmi --- ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ yojayasvā/
S01divav33u:259_1: tat kasya hetoḥ/ dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:260_0: p.39.1ab/.śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutir jñānaṃ dayaiva ca/
S01divav33u:262_1: tad ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ prakāraiḥ svargagamanam iṣyate/
S01divav33u:262_2: ye prāyeṇa jānanti viśeṣeṇa khalv apy anekair vividhari yajñaiḥ/
S01divav33u:262_3: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
S01divav33u:262_5: mātā sarva^bījānāṃ/ marutāṃ mahāmahaḥ/ mahā^kāśyapaṃ manasā vidanti ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:263_0: p.39.3/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ saptagotrāṇi vyākhyāsyāmi tāni śrūyantāṃ/
S01divav33u:263_1: tad yathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kauśikāḥ kāśyapā vāśiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ity etāni brāhmaṇa saptagotrāṇi/
S01divav33u:263_3: atra ye gautamās te kauthumāste gargās te bharadvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇās te vaikhānasās te (40) vajrapādāḥ/
S01divav33u:263_4: te maitreyās te bhārgavās te sāvarṇyā ste salolās te bahujātāḥ/
S01divav33u:263_5: tatra ye kautsās te maudgalyāyanās te gauṇāyanās te lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste soma^bhuvāḥ[vah}/
S01divav33u:263_6: tatra ye kauśikās te kātyāyanās te darbhakātyāyanās te valkalinas te pakṣiṇas te laukākṣās te lohita^āyanāḥ (lohityāyanāḥ) /
S01divav33u:263_7: tatra ye kāśyapās te maṇḍanās te iṣṭās te śauṇḍāyanās te rocaneyās
S01divav33u:263_8: te +anapekṣās te +agniveśyāḥ/ tatra ye vaḥśiṣṭhās te jātukarṇyās te dhānyāyanās te pārāśarās te vyāghranakhās ta āṇḍāyanasta aupamanyavāḥ/
S01divav33u:263_9: tatra ye māṇḍavyās te bhāṇḍāyanās te dhaumrāyaṇās te kātyāyanās te khalv avāhanās te sugandhārāyaṇās te kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
S01divav33u:264_0: p.40.1/.ity etāni brāhmaṇa evam ekonapañcāśad gotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni chandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyāṃ/
S01divav33u:264_1: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
S01divav33u:265_0: p.40.2/.yad utaikatvam iti viditvā bhavān bandhur bhavitum arhati/

S01divav33u:266_1: adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandham abhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/
S01divav33u:267_0: p.41.2ab/.yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalaṃ/
S01divav33u:268_0: p.41.2cd/.prajāpater hi caikatve nirviśeṣo bhavaty ataḥ//
S01divav33u:269_0: p.41.3ab/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ kriyābhedaś ca dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:270_0: p.41.3cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā naiṣāṃ kiñcid viśiṣyate//
S01divav33u:271_0: p.41.4ab/.na hy ātmanaḥ samutkarṣaḥ śreṣṭha tvam iha yujyate/
S01divav33u:274_0: p.41.5cd/.bhavet te bhaginī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//
S01divav33u:275_0: p.41.6ab/.yadi tāvad ayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayaṃ/
S01divav33u:277_0: p.41.7ab/.atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā śūdrasya vā punaḥ/
S01divav33u:278_0: p.41.7cd/.na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//
S01divav33u:279_0: p.41.8ab/.na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
S01divav33u:280_0: p.41.8cd/.nīcaiś ca^uccaiś ca dūśyante sattvā nānā^āśrayāḥ pṛthak//
S01divav33u:281_0: p.41.9ab/.teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
S01divav33u:282_0: p.41.9cd/.atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//
S01divav33u:284_0: p.42.1cd/.itihāso nighaṇṭaś ca kutaś chando nirarthakaṃ//
S01divav33u:285_0: p.42.2ab/.asmākam apy adhyayane maitrī vidyā tathā śikhī/
S01divav33u:287_0: p.42.3ab/.manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṅkarī/
S01divav33u:288_0: p.42.3cd/.kāka^vāṇī ca mantraṃ ca; indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//
S01divav33u:290_0: p.42.4cd/.maṇi^puṣpāś ca; ṛṣayo bhāsvarāś ca maharṣayaḥ//

S01divav33u:297_0: p.43.2cd/.kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahā^muniṃ/
S01divav33u:299_0: p.43.3ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
S01divav33u:300_0: p.43.3cd/.ye ca te manujā; āsan tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
S01divav33u:301_0: p.43.4ab/.paṇḍitāś ca vinītāś ca loke ca; ṛṣisammatāḥ/
S01divav33u:302_0: p.43.4cd/.na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//

S01divav33u:306_1: kiṃ gotro bhavān/ āha ātreyagotro +asmi/ hiṃpūrvaḥ/ āha/ ātreyaḥ/ kiṃcaraṇaḥāha kāleyamaitrāyaṇīyaḥ/
S01divav33u:306_2: kati pravarāḥ/ āha trayaḥ pravarāḥ/ tad yathā vātsyāḥ kautsyā bharadvājāś ca/

S01divav33u:310_3: sa tatra saṃrakta^cittas tayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunam agacchat/
S01divav33u:310_4: sa ṛṣi (45) ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ/

S01divav33u:311_0: p.45.1/.oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ/ tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi/ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt/
S01divav33u:312_0: p.45.2/.iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñāna^śodhanārtham imam eva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divā^rātraṃ japati sma/

S01divav33u:329_1: jyeṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ śāliyavāgubhojanam indradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/

S01divav33u:329_3: kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/ pūrvāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikrama^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/

S01divav33u:329_7: śravaṇā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/

S01divav33u:331_0: p.50.2/.dhaniṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakuna^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/

S01divav33u:331_4: uttarabhādrapadā^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ (51)māṃsāhāram aryamādaivataṃ dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:331_5: revatī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ dadhyāhāraṃ pūṣadaivatam aṣṭabhaginīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divav33u:331_8: bharaṇī^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhaga^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^taṇḍūlāhāraṃ yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/

S01divav33u:333_0: p.51.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ pppuṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇ^nakṣatrāṇi pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni/
S01divav33u:333_1: tad yathā/ rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
S01divav33u:334_1: tad yathā/ ārdrā aśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/

S01divav33u:335_1: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇa^dvārikāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma viśākhā paścimā nāma/
S01divav33u:335_2: amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām anurādhā prathamā nāma śravaṇā paścimā nāma/
S01divav33u:335_3: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām uttara^dvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā
S01divav33u:336_0: p.53.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
S01divav33u:336_1: katamāni sapta/ yad uta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvashḥ svātiś ca/
S01divav33u:336_2: trīṇi dāruṇāni/ ārdrā aśleṣā bharaṇī ceti/ catvāri sammānanīyāni/ yad uta trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ceti/
S01divav33u:336_3: pañca mṛdukāni/ śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
S01divav33u:336_4: abhijic ceti/ catvāri kṣipra^karaṇīyāni/ yad uta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti/
S01divav33u:338_0: p.52.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti/
S01divav33u:338_1: ṛṣabhānusārī yogaḥ/ vatsānusārī yogaḥ/ yuganaddho yogaḥ/ tatra nakṣatraṃ yadi purastād gacchati candraś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
S01divav33u:338_3: yad uta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
S01divav33u:338_6: samau yugapad gacchataḥ, tadāyam ucyate yuganaddho yoga iti/
S01divav33u:340_0: p.53.1/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:340_1: tad yathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ sūryas tārādhipatiś ceti/
S01divav33u:342_0: p.53.2/.evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiś ca bhavati/
S01divav33u:343_0: p.53.3/.hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ dvādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:343_1: aṣṭādaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām aṣṭādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:343_2: dvādaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divav33u:344_1: divasānudivasaṃ/ kiṃ pakṣasya prasthānaṃ/ (54)pratipad/ kiṃ saṃvatsarasya prasthānaṃ/
S01divav33u:346_0: p.54.1/.kiṃ bhos triśaṅko kṣaṇasya parimāṇaṃ / kiṃ lavasya/ kiṃ muhūrtasya/
S01divav33u:347_0: p.54.2/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divav33u:347_1: evaṃ dīrghas tatkṣaṇaḥ/ viṃśatyadhikaṃ tatkṣaṇaśatam ekaḥ kṣaṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:347_2: ṣaṣṭikṣaṇā eko lavaḥ/ triṃśallavā eko muhūrtaḥ/ etena kramasambandhena triṃśan^muhūrtam ekaṃ rātridivasam anumīyate/
S01divav33u:348_0: p.54.3/.āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/

S01divav33u:348_2: dvādaśa^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/

S01divav33u:352_0: p.55.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:352_3: saṃyamo nāma muhūrtaḥ (56) sāṃpraiyako nāma muhūrtaḥ/
S01divav33u:352_4: ananto nāma muhūrtaḥ/ gardabhā nāma muhūrtaḥ/ rākṣaso nāma muhūrtaḥ/ sthite +ardharātre +avayavo nāma muhūrtaḥ/
S01divav33u:352_6: muhūrtaḥ/ ātapāgnir nāma muhūrta/ abhijin nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ity etāni rātrer muhūrtanāmāni/

S01divav33u:353_4: tad yathā striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divav33u:353_5: evaṃ dīrghas tatkṣaṇaḥḥ/ viṃśatyuttarakṣaṇaśataṃ tatkṣaṇasyaikaḥ kṣaṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:353_8: dvādaśa^māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ/ caturojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śarapatho +atisamṛddha udgataḥ (57) sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarva^raso vasuḥ sundaraḥ para^bhayaḥ/
S01divav33u:353_9: raudras tārāvacaraḥ saṃyamaḥ sāṃpraiyako +annanto gardabho rākṣaso +avayavo brahmā ditir arko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnir abhijit/

S01divav33u:358_0: p.57.3/.dvāvakṣinimeṣāv eko lavaḥ/ asṭau lavā ekā kāṣṭhā/ ṣoḍaśakāṣṭhā ekā kalā/ kalānāṃ triṃśadeko nāḍikā/ tatra dve nāḍika eko muhūrtaḥ/

S01divav33u:362_0: p.58.2/.etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭayo +aṣṭapañcāśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi aṣṭāśīti^sahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
S01divav33u:364_3: tad ekaṃ vātāyanarajaḥ/ vātāyanarajāṃsi sapta, śaśa^karajaḥ/ sapta śaśa^karajāṃsy eḍa^karajaḥ/
S01divav33u:364_5: dve vitastī eko hastaḥ/ catvāro hastā ekaṃ dhanuḥ/ dhanuḥ^sahasram ekaḥ krośaḥ/ catvāraḥ krośā eko māgadhayojanaḥ/
S01divav33u:365_0: p.59.1/.paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśata^sahasrāṇi catur^viṃśatiś caikonatriṃśatkoṭi^sahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śata^sahasrāṇi/
S01divav33u:366_0: p.59.2/.śṛṇu brāhmaṇa suvarṇasya parimāṇotpattiṃ/ tatkathayatu bhavān/
S01divav33u:367_0: p.59.3/.dvādaśa yavā māṣakaḥ/ ṣoḍaśa māsakā ekaḥ karṣaḥ/suvarṇasya parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitam iti/
S01divav33u:367_1: dve koṭī pañca^viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāny aṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:368_0: p.59.4/.śṛṇu brāhmaṇa palapramāṇaṃ/ catuḥṣaṣṭi^māṣakāḥ palaṃ māgadhakaṃ/
S01divav33u:368_2: paramāṇūnām aṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate +aśītiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:368_3: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa palasya parimāṇam iti/
S01divav33u:369_2: prasthaḥ/ tat rasa^parimāṇaṃ/ māgadhakayā tulayā prasthāsya parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitaṃ/
S01divav33u:369_3: dve koṭiśate tisraś ca koṭaya ekonatiṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi catuḥsaptati (60) sahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:370_2: māpitaṃ dhānya^parimāṇaṃ/ māgadhakayā tulayā prasthasya parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitaṃ/
S01divav33u:370_3: koṭiśatam aṣṭapañcāśac ca koṭayo dvir aśītiś ca śata sahasrāṇi eka^ṣaṣṭiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāni triṃśac ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divav33u:370_4: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa dhānyasya parimāṇam iti/
S01divav33u:372_1: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatra^vyākaranaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:373_1: rohiṇyāṃ jātaḥ subhago bhavati bhogavāṃś ca/
S01divav33u:373_4: punarvasau jātaḥ kṛṣimān bhavati gorakṣaś ca/
S01divav33u:373_5: puṣye jātaḥ śīlavān bhavati/ aśleṣāyāṃ jātaḥ kāmuko bhavati/
S01divav33u:373_9: svargaparāyaṇaś ca/ haste jātaś cauro bhavati/ citrāyāṃ jāto nṛtyagītakuśalo bhavati,
S01divav33u:373_10: ābharaṇa^vidhijñaś ca/ svātyāṃ jāto gaṇako bhavati, gaṇaka^mahāmātro vā/ viśākhāyāṃ jāto rāja^bhaṭo bhavati/
S01divav33u:373_13: putravān bhavati, yaśasvī ca/ pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto yogācāro bhavati/
S01divav33u:373_14: uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto bhakteśvaraḥ kulīnaś ca bhavati/
S01divav33u:373_21: gandharvaś ca/ revatyāṃ jāto nāviko bhavati/
S01divav33u:375_1: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ /

S01divav33u:989_0: p.125.2cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu bhago py atra tu devatā//%aryaman
S01divav33u:990_0: p.125.3ab/.hastenāpy utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:991_0: p.125.3cd/.pañca^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:992_0: p.125.4ab/.ravir hi devatā tatra gandha^puṣpair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:994_0: p.125.5ab/.citrāyām uttthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:995_0: p.125.5cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:996_0: p.125.6ab/.tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtam udgair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:998_0: p.125.7ab/.svātyāṃ samutthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1000_0: p.125.8ab/.devatā^atra bhaved vāyuś citra^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1002_0: p.125.9ab/.viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1004_0: p.126.1ab/.(126) indrāgnī^devate tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1006_0: p.126.2ab/.anurādhā^utthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1007_0: p.126.2cd/.ardha^māsaṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:1008_0: p.126.3ab/.mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛta^pātraṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1010_0: p.126.4ab/.jyeṣṭhāyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1012_0: p.126.5ab/.indro hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1014_0: p.126.6ab/.mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1015_0: p.126.6cd/.māsiko hi bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:1016_0: p.126.7ab/.nairṛtir devatā tatra madya^māṃsair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1018_0: p.126.8ab/.pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1019_0: p.126.8cd/.sāṃkleśiko bhaved vyādhir aṣṭau māsān na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:1020_0: p.126.9ab/.āpo hi devatās tatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1022_0: p.126.10ab/.uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1023_0: p.126.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:1024_0: p.126.11ab/.viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1026_0: p.127.1ab/.(127) abhijid utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1027_0: p.127.1cd/.ṣaṇ^māsān saṃbhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:1028_0: p.127.2ab/.viṣṇuś ca devatā tatra dadhi^maṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1030_0: p.127.3ab/.śravaṇena^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1031_0: p.127.3cd/.guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśa^māsikaṃ//
S01divav33u:1032_0: p.127.4ab/.viṣṇur hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1034_0: p.127.5ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1035_0: p.127.5cd/.guruko he bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇamāsān trayodaśa//
S01divav33u:1036_0: p.127.6ab/.vasavo devatās tatra ghṛta^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1038_0: p.127.7ab/.śatabhiṣā^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1040_0: p.127.8ab/.varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1042_0: p.127.9ab/.pūrvabhadra^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1043_0: p.127.9cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu ahirbudhnyo +atra daivataḥ//
S01divav33u:1044_0: p.127.10ab/.uttarabhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1045_0: p.127.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
S01divav33u:1046_0: p.128.1ab/.(128) aryamā devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1048_0: p.128.2ab/.revatyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1050_0: p.128.3ab/.pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
S01divav33u:1052_0: p.128.4ab/.aśvinyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1054_0: p.128.5ab/.gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/ %gandharva!
S01divav33u:1056_0: p.128.6ab/.bharaṇyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divav33u:1057_0: p.128.6cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu yamas tatra tu daivataḥ/
S01divav33u:1058_0: p.128.7ab/.śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//
S01divav33u:1061_0: p.128.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhana^nirmokṣaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1062_0: p.129.1/.kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:1062_1: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:1062_2: mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā eka^viṃśati rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:1062_3: ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā +ardha^māsena mokṣyati^iti/
S01divav33u:1062_4: punarvasau ruddho vā baddho vā sapta^rātrena/
S01divav33u:1062_5: maghāsu ṣoḍaśa^rātreṇa/ citrāyāṃ sapta^rātreṇa/ svātyāṃ daśa^rātreṇa/ viśākhāyāṃ ṣaḍviṃśad^rātreṇa/
S01divav33u:1062_7: jyeṣṭhāyām aṣṭādaśa^rātreṇa/ mūle ṣaṭtriṃśad rātreṇa/ pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ catur^daśa^rātreṇa/
S01divav33u:1062_9: abhijiti ṣaḍ^rātreṇa/ śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhadrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ
S01divav33u:1062_10: catur^daśa^rātreṇa/ aśvinyāṃ tri^rātreṇa/ bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśam avāpsyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:1065_0: p.129.3/.atha boḥ puskarasārin tilaka^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān//
S01divav33u:1066_0: p.129.4/.mūrdhni tu yasyās tilako +asti sūkṣmaḥ snigdho bhavet padma^samāna^varṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:1067_0: p.129.5/.rājā tu tasyā bhavati^iha bhartā stana^upariṣṭāt pratibimbam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:1068_0: p.130.1ab/.śīrṣe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhaved añjana^cūrṇa^varṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:1069_0: p.130.1cd/.senāpatis tasyā bhaved dhi bhartā stana^antare +asyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:1070_0: p.130.2ab/.bhrūvontare +asyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duṣcāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:1071_0: p.130.2cd/.pañca^eva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahv^anna^pānaṃ labhate ca nārī//
S01divav33u:1072_0: p.131.1ab/.gaṇḍasya nāsādikam adhyadeśe bhavec ca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
S01divav33u:1073_0: p.131.1cd/.tāṃ śoka^bhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:1074_0: p.131.2ab/.karṇe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād bahu^śrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:1075_0: p.131.2cd/.bahu^śrūtāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:1076_0: p.131.3ab/.yasya^uttaroṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syāt tāṃ bhinna^satyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:1077_0: p.131.3cd/.kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttim ūrau tu tasyās tila^bimbam āhuḥ//
S01divav33u:1078_0: p.132.1ab/.yasyā +adharoṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:1079_0: p.132.1cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:1080_0: p.132.2ab/.cibuke tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divav33u:1081_0: p.132.2cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:1083_0: p.132.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^janma^guṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1085_0: p.132.5b/.bhavec chūras tathā caṇḍaḥ priya^vādī ca mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:1086_0: p.132.6a/.rohiṇyāṃ puruṣo jāto dhanavān dharmikas tathā/
S01divav33u:1087_0: p.132.6b/.vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ ca^asya sadā mukhaṃ//
S01divav33u:1088_0: p.133.1ab/.jāto mṛgaśire yas tu mṛduḥ saumyas tu mānavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1089_0: p.133.1cd/.darśanīyo bhavec ca^asau strī^kāntas tu viśeṣataḥ//
S01divav33u:1091_0: p.133.2cd/.rodrakarmā bhavec ca^asāv īścaraś ca śatair mahān//
S01divav33u:1092_0: p.133.3ab/.jātaḥ punarvasau yas tu hy alolo buddhimān naraḥ/
S01divav33u:1093_0: p.133.3cd/.dharma^śīlo bhavec ca^asau jāta^krodhaś ca mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:1094_0: p.133.4ab/.puṣyeṇa puruṣo jātas tejasvī brāhmaṇo bhavet/
S01divav33u:1095_0: p.133.4cd/.kṣatriyaś ca bhaved rājā vaiśya^sūdrau ca pūjitau//
S01divav33u:1096_0: p.133.5ab/.śvasanaḥ krodhanaḥ krūro hy aśleṣā^sambhavo naraḥ/
S01divav33u:1097_0: p.133.5cd/.durmanuṣyaś ca caṇḍaś ca; iti sarvam ihādiśet//
S01divav33u:1099_0: p.133.6cd/.dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//
S01divav33u:1100_0: p.133.7ab/.pūrvaphālgunī^jātas tu yaḥ kaścit puruṣo bhavet/
S01divav33u:1102_0: p.133.8ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
S01divav33u:1103_0: p.133.8cd/.divyajñānaś ca vijñāne puruṣaḥ subhago bhavet//
S01divav33u:1104_0: p.133.9ab/.haste jātaś ca śuddha^ātmā vikrānto mṛdu^bhojanaḥ/
S01divav33u:1108_0: p.134.1ab/.svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuś lāghī cicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:1110_0: p.134.2ab/.viśākhāsu naro jātas tejasvī dravyavān mahān/
S01divav33u:1110_1: p.134.2cd/.śūro vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaś ca bhaved asau//
S01divav33u:1112_0: p.134.3cd/.śuciś ca^eva kṛta^jñaś ca dharma^ātmā ca bhavec ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:1116_0: p.134.5cd/.dṛḍho vīro bhavec ca^asau kilviṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:1118_0: p.134.6cd/.matsya^māṃsa^priyaś ca^api ghātakaḥ syāt sa mānavaḥ//
S01divav33u:1119_0: p.134.7ab/.sa^anukrośaś ca dātā ca vidyāniṣṭhaḥ suhṛjjanaḥ/
S01divav33u:1120_0: p.134.7cd/.viśvadaive naro jāto bhaved api ca niścitaḥ//
S01divav33u:1121_0: p.134.8ab/.ācāryaḥ śāstra^kartā ca viśvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
S01divav33u:1122_0: p.134.8cd/.śravaṇe jata; āyuṣmān śrīmāṃś ca puruṣo bhavet//
S01divav33u:1125_0: p.135.1ab/.vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1126_0: p.135.1cd/.paruṣo kveṣaśīlaś ca parivādī ca sarvaśaḥ//
S01divav33u:1127_0: p.135.2ab/.jāto bhādrapadāyāṃ tu pūrvasyām iha mānavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1130_0: p.135.3cd/.medhāvī bahv apatyaś ca dharma^śīlo mahā^dhanaḥ//
S01divav33u:1134_0: p.135.5cd/.mahā^jana^priyaś ca^api śūraś ca subhagaś ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:1138_0: p.135.8/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko utpāta^cakraṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ kathayati ca/
S01divav33u:1142_0: u1.2ab/.māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivā yadi/
S01divav33u:1144_0: u1.2ef/.vidyuto vā^atha dṛśyante tadā vidyāj jana^kṣayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1145_0: u1.3ab/.aśvinyām arkato dhūmo nirgacchann api chādayet/
S01divav33u:1147_0: u1.4cd/.samantād vadhyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1148_0: u1.5ab/.phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu; āditye parikho yadi/
S01divav33u:1149_0: u1.5cd/.naśyanti karvaṭās tatra yadi devo na varṣati//
S01divav33u:1150_0: u1.6ab/.caitra^māse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇāṃ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1153_0: u1.7cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ tatra jānīyād ubhau ghātyete pārthivau//
S01divav33u:1155_0: u1.8cd/.sa^amātyo vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre durbhikṣam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1162_0: u1.12ab/.māse +atha śrāvaṇe mūle candra^sūryau na bhāsataḥ/
S01divav33u:1163_0: u1.12cd/.sphuliṅgāś ca^atra dṛśyante vidyād roga^bhayaṃ mahat//
S01divav33u:1168_0: u1.15ab/.ravivad bhāti tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta punaḥ punaḥ/
S01divav33u:1169_0: u1.15cd/.rājñāṃ vidyād dhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāstyati śoṇitaṃ//
S01divav33u:1170_0: u1.16ab/.bharaṇyāṃ māgha^māse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
S01divav33u:1171_0: u1.16cd/.chādayec candra^sūryau tu śīghraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:1172_0: u1.17ab/.māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutaṃ/
S01divav33u:1174_0: u1.18ab/.saha^ādityena candre +atha yadā kaścid grahaś caret/
S01divav33u:1175_0: u1.18cd/.vāyur vā viṣamo vātii vidyād rāja^vadhaṃ tadā//
S01divav33u:1180_0: u1.21ab/.jyeṣṭhe ca pāṃśur varṣeta; ādityaḥ pariviṣyate/
S01divav33u:1184_0: u1.23ab/.śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhas^talaṃ/
S01divav33u:1186_0: u1.24ab/.śrāvaṇe varṣate hy agniḥ pūrvabhādrapade divā/
S01divav33u:1188_0: u1.25ab/.yadā bhādrapade māse nabhaḥ syāc channa^garjitaṃ/(p.138)
S01divav33u:1191_0: u1.26cd/.pātayec ca^evam āghātaṃ kṛtsnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:1192_0: u1.27ab/.kārttike śukla^trayodaśyāṃ yadā candre dhanur bhavet/
S01divav33u:1193_0: u1.27cd/.samantān naśyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1194_0: u1.28ab/.ulkā^pātā hy aśanayo māgha^māse bhavanti vā/
S01divav33u:1196_0: u1.29ab/.māse tu phālgune yatra; āgnivarṣaṃ nabhas^talāt/
S01divav33u:1197_0: u1.29cd/.bhavec chabdas tadākāśe tad^rāṣṭraṃ naśyate laghu//
S01divav33u:1198_0: u1.30ab/.svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vāta^varṣitaṃ/
S01divav33u:1200_0: u1.31ab/.bharaṇyāṃ jyeṣṭha^māse tu śabda; uttarato bhavet/
S01divav33u:1202_0: u1.32ab/.āṣāḍhe māsi puṣye +atha dṛśyante vyogni vidyutaḥ/
S01divav33u:1203_1: u1.33ab/.śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
S01divav33u:1205_0: u1.34ab/.māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
S01divav33u:1207_0: u1.35ab/.māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
S01divav33u:1208_0: u1.35cd/.kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu datā prajā//
S01divav33u:1209_0: u1.36ab/.bharaṇyām aśvayuje śabda upariṣṭād bhaved yadi/
S01divav33u:1211_0: u1.37ab/.kārttike tu yadā^ārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrayeta bhairavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1214_0: u1.38cd/.vātāturas tadā rāṣṭre vyādhir bhavati dāruṇaḥ//
S01divav33u:1215_0: u1.39ab/.pauṣa^māse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
S01divav33u:1217_0: u1.40ab/.māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyed vasundharāṃ/
S01divav33u:1221_0: u1.42ab/.pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ tu caitre kampet kṣitir divā/
S01divav33u:1222_0: u1.42cd/.tasmin varṣe ca tadrāṣṭre parasainyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1223_0: u1.43ab/.pūrvāyāṃ ced āṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
S01divav33u:1224_0: u1.43cd/.asibhir hanyate rājā hanyate ca mahā^janaḥ//
S01divav33u:1225_0: u1.44ab/.vaiśākhe kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇa^pakṣe hy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ/

S01divav33u:1227_0: u1.45ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kamped vasundharā/
S01divav33u:1229_0: u1.46ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
S01divav33u:1230_0: u1.46cd/.pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//
S01divav33u:1232_0: u1.47cd/.śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//
S01divav33u:1233_0: u1.48ab/.prakampante yadā caityā; ādrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā/
S01divav33u:1234_0: u1.48cd/.jvaleyuḥ prapateyur vā naśyed rāṣṭraṃ tadā laghu//
S01divav33u:1235_0: u1.49ab/.caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
S01divav33u:1236_0: u1.49cd/.sarāṣṭraḥ kṣitipas tatra na cirān nāśam arcchati//
S01divav33u:1238_0: u1.50cd/.sadā parājito rājā caura^rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//
S01divav33u:1240_0: u1.51cd/.dvāraṃ vā nagarasya^atha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//
S01divav33u:1241_0: u1.52ab/.vāme vā kaṣīṇe candroḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divav33u:1246_0: u1.54cd/.jñeyaṃ roga^bhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1247_0: u1.55ab/.rāhuṇā nigṛhītas tu ca^ullkayā hanyate śaśī/
S01divav33u:1249_0: u1.56ab/.yasya caiva^atha nakṣatre śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
S01divav33u:1250_0: u1.56cd/.rāhuṇā kṣitiyo rājyaiḥ saha pīḍām avāpnuyāt//
S01divav33u:1251_0: u1.57ab/.rājño vai ca^atha nakṣatre candraṃ ketur yadā viśet/
S01divav33u:1255_0: u1.59ab/.bṛhaspatiś ca śukraś ca lohita^aṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ/
S01divav33u:1259_0: u1.61ab/.maghāyāṃ lohita^aṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divav33u:1261_0: u1.62ab/.tiṣṭhec chukro +atha rohiṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana/
S01divav33u:1264_0: u1.63cd/.somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ para^cakra^bhayaṃ tadā//
S01divav33u:1265_0: u1.64ab/.kākāḥ śyenāś ca bṛdhrāś ca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
S01divav33u:1266_0: u1.64cd/.maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇas tadā//
S01divav33u:1267_0: u1.65ab/.śyeno hastinivāse vā; abhirohet punaḥ punaḥ/
S01divav33u:1268_0: u1.65cd/.para^cakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhavec ca^api punaḥ punaḥ/.
S01divav33u:1270_0: u1.66cd/.strīṇām eva bhavet tatra maraṇaṃ hy atidāruṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:1271_0: u1.67ab/.garbha^sthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
S01divav33u:1273_0: u1.68ab/.eka^pādāṃ stripādāṃś ca catur^aṅgāṃs tathā^eva ca/
S01divav33u:1274_0: u1.68cd/.nāryo yatra prasūyante rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1276_0: u1.69cd/.pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:1278_0: u1.70cd/.pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:1278_1: u1.71ab/.kharāś ca mahiṣāś ca^api paśavo +atha tathāvidhāḥ/
S01divav33u:1279_0: u1.71cd/.dvi^tri^śīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//
S01divav33u:1281_0: u1.72cd/.jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//
S01divav33u:1282_0: u1.73ab/.pādāv ubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate/
S01divav33u:1285_0: u1.74cd/.rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//
S01divav33u:1287_0: u1.75cd/.trinetras trimukho vā^api vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1288_0: u1.76ab/.saukareṇa tu vakreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣaṃ yadi/
S01divav33u:1288_1: u1.76cd/.sūtaṃ catur^diśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tatra na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:1289_0: u1.77ab/.ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
S01divav33u:1291_0: u1.78ab/.uttānaśāyī bālas tu deśaṃ yatra dvijottamaḥ/
S01divav33u:1292_0: u1.78cd/.dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyatei//
S01divav33u:1293_0: u1.79ab/.kukṣiṃ bhitvā yadā bālo garbhān niṣkramate svayaṃ/
S01divav33u:1294_0: u1.79cd/.atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//
S01divav33u:1295_0: u1.80ab/.garbha^sthāḥ sūkarā; uṣṭrāḥ sarpāś ca śakunis tathā/
S01divav33u:1296_0: u1.80cd/.strīṇāṃ garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu bhayam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1298_0: u1.81cd/.gāvo yatra prasūyante nirdiśed bhayam āgataṃ//
S01divav33u:1302_0: u1.83cd/.sajano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//
S01divav33u:1304_0: u1.84cd/.śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaś ca vilayaṃ vrajet/
S01divav33u:1306_0: u1.85cd/.svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:1307_0: u1.86ab/.phale phalaṃ yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritaṃ/
S01divav33u:1308_0: u1.86cd/.garbhāḥ sraveyur nārīṇāṃ yuvarājaś ca vadhyate//
S01divav33u:1309_0: u1.87ab/.akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/(p.143)
S01divav33u:1310_0: u1.87cd/.latā gulmo +atha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:1312_0: u1.88cd/.kūjamānaṃ pataṅgaṃ vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1313_0: u1.89ab/.vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
S01divav33u:1317_0: u1.91ab/.anāvartaṃ yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca^api pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1317_1: u1.91cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//
S01divav33u:1318_0: u1.92ab/.sthānāsthānaṃ gatā vṛkṣā dṛśyeyur yatra kutracit/
S01divav33u:1321_0: u1.93cd/.śastraṃ mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiś ca^api pūrvavat//
S01divav33u:1322_0: u1.94ab/.kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1324_0: u1.95ab/.devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
S01divav33u:1325_0: u1.95cd/.aśrūṇi pātayeyur vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1326_0: u1.96ab/.devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
S01divav33u:1327_0: u1.96cd/.caleyur athavā yatra kṣiti^po +anyo bhavet tadā//
S01divav33u:1328_0: u1.97ab/.śivaliṅaṃ yadā kamped gagane vā^atha dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1329_0: u1.97cd/.nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rāja^vadho bhavet//
S01divav33u:1332_0: u1.99ab/.acalo vā calet sthānāc calaṃ vā^apy acalaṃ bhavet/
S01divav33u:1333_0: u1.99cd/.amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1334_0: u1.100ab/.vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/(p.144)
S01divav33u:1336_0: u1.101ab/.varṣate kusumaṃ yatra rakta^vindum atha^api vā/
S01divav33u:1337_0: u1.101cd/.prāṇino vividhān vā^api vidyāc caura^bhayaṃ tadā//
S01divav33u:1339_0: u1.102cd/.nagarāṇy atha dhūmyante kṣipraṃ rājā vinaśyati//
S01divav33u:1340_0: u1.103ab/.indur vā dīpa^vṛkso vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
S01divav33u:1341_0: u1.103cd/.rājyakāmaḥ kumāro vā kṣubhyed viṭapako +api vā//
S01divav33u:1343_0: u1.104cd/.astraṃ vā^api gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1344_0: u1.105ab/.pated antaḥpure vidyud vṛkṣe vā^apy āśrame tathā/
S01divav33u:1345_0: u1.105cd/.puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//
S01divav33u:1347_0: u1.106cd/.vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sa^amātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//
S01divav33u:1355_0: u1.110cd/.śoṇitaṃ sakarakaṃ syāt tadā vidyāt parād bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1356_0: u1.111ab/.vidyuc ca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇaṃ/
S01divav33u:1361_0: u1.113cd/.gaganaṃ dahyate tatra loka^pīḍā jvareṇa ca//
S01divav33u:1366_0: u1.116ab/.nāpsu majjati na^apy agnau pūrvavac ca na dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1367_0: u1.116cd/.agnir utpatsyate tatra koṣṭha^āgāraṃ daheta saḥ//
S01divav33u:1370_0: u1.118ab/.jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayaṃ/
S01divav33u:1371_0: u1.118cd/.anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1373_0: u1.119cd/.cakra^dvaye +api durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1374_0: u1.120ab/.triśīrṣaḥ pañca^śīrṣo vā yadā sarpo +atha dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1376_0: u1.121ab/.kuśūlo yatra dṛśyeta kampayan tu vasundharāṃ/
S01divav33u:1378_0: u1.122ab/.sarpa; udyata^śīrṣas tu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha/
S01divav33u:1379_0: u1.122cd/.cakra^dvayād rogataś ca vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1383_0: u1.124cd/.tatas taṃ na cirāt paśyet saṃgrāmaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:1384_0: u1.125ab/.kākaḥ śyenaś ca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/(146)
S01divav33u:1386_0: u1.126ab/.prāsādāś ca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca/
S01divav33u:1392_0: u1.129ab/.vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyur mucyeyus tvaco vā tathā/
S01divav33u:1393_0: u1.129cd/.sarvasmin eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāc chatru^bhayaṃ mahat//
S01divav33u:1394_0: u1.130ab/.dine hy ulkā^prayuktir vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1396_0: u1.131ab/.asiṃ prajvalitaṃ paśyet tomaraṃ cakram eva ca/
S01divav33u:1398_0: u1.132ab/.dīrgham ucchvasate vā +aśvaḥ aśrūṇi ca nipātayet/
S01divav33u:1399_0: u1.132cd/.pādena karṣate śīghraṃ yuddhe rāja^vadho dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:1400_0: u1.133ab/.kākaś ced gṛham āruhya hā putra; iti vāśati/
S01divav33u:1402_0: u1.134ab/.anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
S01divav33u:1403_0: u1.134cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya niyamāc chīghram ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1404_0: u1.135ab/.āravanti yadā ghoraṃ meghā vṛkamṛgās tathā/
S01divav33u:1405_0: u1.135cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāc chīghram upasthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:1407_0: u1.136cd/.gṛhāḥ śūnyodakena^api śuṣkās tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:1411_0: u1.138cd/.anyad vā^api praharaṇaṃ parebhyo jāyate bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1414_0: u1.140ab/.narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca rati^harṣo na jāyate/
S01divav33u:1415_0: u1.140cd/.sarvatra śoka^cintā vā mahat tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:1416_0: u1.141ab/.nirgranthā; ṛṣayaḥ santo deśān prakrameyur yataḥ/
S01divav33u:1417_0: u1.141cd/.nadīṃ bhitvā nikuñjānvā sa deśo naśyate +acirāt//
S01divav33u:1418_0: u1.142ab/.yatrauṣadhyaś ca virasā jalaṃ ca parihīyate/
S01divav33u:1420_0: u1.143ab/.matsyāḥ kūrmāś ca sarpāś ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
S01divav33u:1422_0: u1.144ab/.apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi; eva vā/
S01divav33u:1424_0: u1.145ab/.mahā^patho yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtair apatho bhavet/
S01divav33u:1427_0: u1.147/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān/
S01divav33u:1428_0: u1.148/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:1429_3: 148) dairghyeṇa jñātavyaṃ/ ekākṣagṛṣṭiḥ śīrṣa^mūrdhni eka^pāda^talaṃ bhavet/
S01divav33u:1429_4: catur^daśa gṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ yatra saṃdṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1429_5: tad anyathā na bhavati/ nakṣatre yatra yo jātas tatra
S01divav33u:1431_0: u2.1ab/.kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
S01divav33u:1432_0: u2.2ab/.bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ paṇḍito jvalati śriyā/
S01divav33u:1433_0: u2.2cd/.kṛttikāsv atha jātasya bhavaty etad dhi lakṣaṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:1434_0: u2.3ab/.dṛśyate vraṇa; evāyaṃ yasya vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
S01divav33u:1435_0: u2.3cd/.rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so +api vidvān dharma^rataḥ sadā//
S01divav33u:1438_0: u2.5ab/.grīvāyām ardha^gṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1439_0: u2.5cd/.mṛgaśīrṣe hy asau jātaḥ śūro bhoga^samarpitaḥ//
S01divav33u:1440_0: u2.6ab/.ardha^dvitīya^gṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
S01divav33u:1441_0: u2.6cd/.ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaś ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:1442_0: u2.7ab/.vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaś ca^eva punarvasau/
S01divav33u:1445_0: u2.8cd/.cakra^madhye ca haste ca sūryaś candro virājate//
S01divav33u:1448_0: u2.10ab/.hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syād śleṣāyāṃ kali^priyaḥ/
S01divav33u:1449_0: u2.10cd/.duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhir ataś ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:1450_0: u2.11ab/.adha; urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1451_0: u2.11cd/.maghāyāṃ dhanavān jāto mahā^ātma dhārmiko naraḥ//
S01divav33u:1458_0: u2.15ab/.vyaṃjane yasya pinyas tu dṛśyate niyamenahi/
S01divav33u:1459_0: u2.15cd/.citrā^jātaḥ sa ced rogī nṛtyagītaratas tathā//
S01divav33u:1460_0: u2.16ab/.vyañjane +api ca; ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥpradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1461_0: u2.16cd/.jātaḥ svātyām asau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hy apaṇḍitaḥ//
S01divav33u:1462_0: u2.17ab/.kugṛṣṭyā yasya; ūrūbhyāṃ pinyo lohita; eva hi/
S01divav33u:1468_0: u2.20ab/.adho yasya^iha ca^ūrubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
S01divav33u:1468_1: u2.20cd/.alpa^ayur apriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā//
S01divav33u:1469_0: u2.21ab/.jānubhyām ūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasya^iha dṛśyate/(p.150)
S01divav33u:1470_0: u2.21cd/.mūlena bhāgyavān jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayel laghu//
S01divav33u:1474_0: u2.23cd/.yadi dṛśyet sa medhāvī bhogavān syāj jana^priyaḥ//
S01divav33u:1475_0: u2.24ab/.dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
S01divav33u:1477_0: u2.25ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1479_0: u2.26ab/.dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1480_0: u2.26cd/.mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hy adakena saḥ//
S01divav33u:1481_0: u2.27ab/.adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:1482_0: u2.27cd/.paropatāpako mūrkho daridraś caura; ity api//
S01divav33u:1483_0: u2.28ab/.kuguṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syāj jāto bhādrapada^uttare/
S01divav33u:1485_0: u2.29ab/.ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divav33u:1486_0: u2.29cd/.revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa havaty api//
S01divav33u:1488_0: u2.30cd/.arogo balavān nityam aśvinyāṃ jāta; eva saḥ//
S01divav33u:1489_0: u2.31ab/.atha pāṇitale pinyo bharaṇyām akṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:1491_0: u2.32ab/.nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ hy etad yena caryā prajāyate/
S01divav33u:1492_0: u2.32cd/.etad dhi loka^prajñānaṃ loko yatra samāśritaḥ//iti pinyādhyāyāḥ//
S01divav33u:1493_0: u2.33/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1496_0: u3.1cd/.strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarva^karmakaṃ//
S01divav33u:1497_0: u3.2ab/.lābha^alābhaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:1498_0: u3.2cd/.prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatāṃ//
S01divav33u:1499_0: u3.3ab/.tatrābhighātadagdhā vā tilās tad rūpakā; api/

S01divav33u:1544_0: u3.25ab/.snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalaṃ/
S01divav33u:1544_1: u3.25cd/.sthāna^sthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayaṃ//

S01divav33u:1547_0: u3.26ef/.tathā ca^abhyantare ca^eva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//
S01divav33u:1548_0: u3.27ab/.strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrān teṣu ca parvataḥ/
S01divav33u:1549_0: u3.27cd/.tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānaṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//
S01divav33u:1550_0: u3.28ab/.sthāna^asthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatim eva ca/
S01divav33u:1551_0: u3.28cd/.ādiśet tu naraḥ paścād yatha^evaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:1552_0: u3.29ab/.vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
S01divav33u:1553_0: u3.29cd/.dakṣiṇe tu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavanti hy artha^sādhakāḥ//
S01divav33u:1554_0: u3.30ab/.viparītās tu piṭakā moghās tu bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divav33u:1555_0: u3.30cd/.yathoktānaṃ ca sandhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//
S01divav33u:1556_0: u3.31ab/.siddhāḥ dhruvā vraṇā bhidyās tathā sadyaḥ^kṛtāś ca ye/
S01divav33u:1557_0: u3.31cd/.dharma^kīlasamāś ca^eva sarve te piṭakāḥ smṛtāḥ//
S01divav33u:1559_0: u3.32cd/.ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ śiṣyebhyo nitya^darśanaṃ//
S01divav33u:1560_0: u3.33ab/.na nakhena na śastreṇa na^āyasena kathaṃcana/(p.154)
S01divav33u:1561_0: u3.33cd/.kāñcanena suvarṇena dahed viprāṃś ca bhojayed//
S01divav33u:1563_0: u3.35/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:1565_0: u4.1ab/.śubha^aśubhaṃ ca svapnānāṃ yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ/
S01divav33u:1567_0: u4.1ef/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//

S01divav33u:1572_0: u4.4ab/.samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/

S01divav33u:1588_0: u4.12ab/.āsane śayane yane śarīre +atha gṛhe kṣayaḥ/
S01divav33u:1589_0: u4.12cd/.yeṣām ārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ teṣām ārohaṇāt kṣayaḥ/

S01divav33u:1591_0: u4.13ab/.tri^sāhasraṃ bhavet kaṇṭhe daśa śīrṣasya chedane/

S01divav33u:1597_0: u4.16ab/.kākaṃ śyenam ulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vā^apy atha vartakaṃ/
S01divav33u:1598_0: u4.16cd/.mayūraṃ paśyataḥ svapne tasya vyasanam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:1599_0: u4.17ab/.nagnaṃ paśyati hy ātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastam eva vā/
S01divav33u:1601_0: u4.18ab/.kuṇḍthāḥ striyo +atha saṃlokya caurān dyūta^karāṃs tathā/
S01divav33u:1602_0: u4.18cd/.kuśīlāṃś cāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:1604_0: u4.19cd/.udvartanaṃ vā kurvāṇaḥ svapna^ante rogam arcchati//
S01divav33u:1605_0: u4.20ab/.dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapna^ante yasya dhāryate/
S01divav33u:1607_0: u4.21acd/.antrais tu yasya nagaraṃ samantāt parivāryate/(p.156)
S01divav33u:1609_0: u4.22ab/.manuṣyaṃ bhūmi^bhāgaṃ vā svapna^ante grasate yadi/
S01divav33u:1610_0: u4.22cd/.hradaś ca vā samudro +ayaṃ mahad^aiśvaryam āpnuyāt//
S01divav33u:1611_0: u4.23ab/.dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śastraṃ raktam ābharaṇaṃ dhvajaṃ/
S01divav33u:1612_0: u4.23cd/.kavacaṃ vā labhet svapne dhana^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1613_0: u4.24ab/.prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/

S01divav33u:1620_0: u4.27ab/.kṛṣṇa^vastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ/
S01divav33u:1622_0: u4.28ab/.tamasi praviśet svapne śambhor vā ca^amaraṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:1623_0: u4.28cd/.vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1624_0: u4.29ab/.vṛkṣāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā^api virucaṃ yas tu paśyati/
S01divav33u:1625_0: u4.29cd/.svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//

S01divav33u:1629_0: u4.31cd/.patitau patamānau vā cakṣus tasya vinaśyati//

S01divav33u:1639_0: u4.36cd/.krīḍed akuśalāṅkair vā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//

S01divav33u:1653_0: u4.44ab/.yaṃ kṛṣṇa^vasanā nārī; ārdrā vā malinātha vā/

S01divav33u:1676_0: u4.56cd/.abhivadeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate +acirāt//
S01divav33u:1677_0: u4.57ab/.eṣām anyatamaḥ kuṣau praviśec ca yadi striyāḥ/

S01divav33u:1687_0: u4.61cd/.śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣa^maraṇaṃ bhavet//

S01divav33u:1711_0: u4.73cd/.madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//
S01divav33u:1712_0: u4.74ab/.pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
S01divav33u:1714_0: u4.75ab/.svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/

S01divav33u:1721_0: u4.78ab/.dhūmrā ghanā dundubhi^śaṅkha^śabdo vāto +abhra^vṛṣṭiś ca tathā samantāt/
S01divav33u:1722_0: u4.78cd/.sarva^sthirāṇāṃ ca calaś ca yaḥ syād ye ca^antare doṣa^kṛtā vikārāḥ//
S01divav33u:1723_0: u4.79ab/.pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvad iṣṭā rāja^rṣayo deva^gaṇāś ca sarve/
