S01divav33u:1725_0: u4.80ab/.yat pūrva^rūpeṣu bhavet praśastaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni śamaṃ nayanti/
S01divav33u:1726_0: u4.80cd/.gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvija^pūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnam etena parijitaṃ syāt//
S01divav33u:1727_0: u4.81ab/.devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyas taṃ tu parāṃś ca^arcayituṃ yateta/(p.161)

S01divav33u:1869_2: dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divav33u:1870_0: u8.12ab/.vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathā^eva vidiśāsu ca/
S01divav33u:1872_0: u8.13ab/.adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā//
S01divav33u:1875_0: u8.15/.vyādhir upadravāś ca, ``sava tu praśamaṃ yānti triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā'' /
S01divav33u:1875_2: yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
S01divav33u:1876_0: u8.16/.yat kiñcit kāryam ārabhiṣyati tatsarvaṃ nivedayati/
S01divav33u:1880_1: tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:1885_0: u9.2cd/.tatra jātaṃ sukhataraṃ dvitīyā jñānam antare//
S01divav33u:1886_0: u9.3ab/.tṛtīyā sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
S01divav33u:1889_0: u9.4cd/.dviniḥsṛto viśuddha^ātmā jīved varṣaśataṃ hi saḥ//
S01divav33u:1890_0: u9.5ab/.triṃśat tribhāgena jāyīyād ardhe pañcāśad āyuṣaḥ/
S01divav33u:1896_0: u9.8ab/.dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
S01divav33u:1897_0: u9.8cd/.hrasvāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dhrasvalekhā tu yā bhavet//
S01divav33u:1899_0: u9.9cd/.divā tu janma nirdiṣṭam aṅguṣṭha^yavake dhravaṃ//
S01divav33u:1900_0: u9.10ab/.avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
S01divav33u:1902_0: u9.11ab/.divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strī^saṃjñako bhavet/(p.173)
S01divav33u:1903_0: u9.11cd/.rātriḥ sandhyā samākhyātā bhāgair anyair na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:1907_0: u9.13ab/.yavamālā ca matsyaḥ syād aṅguṣṭha^yavako ratau/
S01divav33u:1909_0: u9.14ab/.yasya syād yavakaś ca^api ca^apo vā svastikas tathā/
S01divav33u:1910_0: u9.14cd/.taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyās te puruṣā hy amī//
S01divav33u:1911_0: u9.15ab/.matsyo dhānyaṃ bhaved bhogāyāmiṣādau yave dhanaṃ/
S01divav33u:1913_0: u9.16ab/.patākābhir dhvajair vā^api śaktibhis tomarais tathā/
S01divav33u:1916_0: u9.17ab/.prekṣyante śākhyā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
S01divav33u:1917_0: u9.17cd/.kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiś ca^api satkṛtaḥ//
S01divav33u:1918_0: u9.18ab/.vaiśyo +atha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhana^dhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:1920_0: u9.19ab/.satatam abhipūjyaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃvadaḥ/
S01divav33u:1921_0: u9.19cd/.viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahus tathā//
S01divav33u:1922_0: u9.20ab/.śyāmavarṇā +atha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
S01divav33u:1923_0: u9.20cd/.ktilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karathitāḥ/
S01divav33u:1924_0: u9.20ef/.mahā^bhogo mahā^vidvān jīved varṣaśataṃ ca saḥ//
S01divav33u:1926_0: u9.21cd/.taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatiṃ//
S01divav33u:1927_0: u9.22ab/.bhagas tu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākair hastyaśvamālāṅkuśataś ca rājā/
S01divav33u:1928_0: u9.22cd/.matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedis tu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//
S01divav33u:1929_0: u9.23ab/.anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
S01divav33u:1930_0: u9.23cd/.sametvaśītir varṣāṇi saptabhir yathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//
S01divav33u:1931_0: u9.24ab/.śarīravarṇa^prabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇa^vihīnakāṃ ca/
S01divav33u:1933_0: u9.25ab/.abhyañjanodvartana satkarī[ṣaira]dhyakṣa cūrṇaiś ca vimṛjya pāṇiṃ/
S01divav33u:1934_0: u9.25cd/.prakṣālya caika^antaraghṛṣṭa^lekhām ekāgracittas tu karaṃ parīkṣet//
S01divav33u:1935_0: u9.26ab/.valayasamanarādhipaṃ bhajantyaḥ samanugatā maṇibandhane tu tisraḥ/
S01divav33u:1936_0: u9.26cd/.dvir api ca [sa] bhava^antare mahā^ātmā vippuladhana^śriya āha vastra^lābhaḥ//
S01divav33u:1937_0: u9.27ab/.dadati satatam unnatas tu pāṇir bhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
S01divav33u:1939_0: u9.28ab/.sudṛśa[kara^talaiś ca]sādhavaste kuṭilakṛtair vinimīlitaiś ca dhūrtāḥ/
S01divav33u:1940_0: u9.28cd/.bhavati rudhirasannibhaḥ suraktaś ciram iha piṇḍitapāṇirīśvaraḥ syāt//
S01divav33u:1942_0: u9.29cd/.bhavati bahu^dhano nigūḍhapāṇiś ciram iha jīvati pāna^bhoga^bhogī//
S01divav33u:1943_0: u9.30ab/.subhaga iha tathoṣṇadīrghapāṇir dhruvam iha śītalapāṇikas tu śaṇṭhaḥ/
S01divav33u:1944_0: u9.30cd/.iha hi bahu^dhano balena yuktaḥ sutanu susañcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//
S01divav33u:1945_0: u9.31ab/.dhanam upanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛta^janitā jalavac ca yā sudīrghā/(p.175)
S01divav33u:1946_0: u9.31cd/.jalavadanugatā suvarṇa^varṇā dhanam adhigacchati nimnaśonnatā yā//
S01divav33u:1947_0: u9.32ab/.dhanam upalabhate surakta^pāṇir vipulamatho ca nirantarāṅguliḥ syāt/
S01divav33u:1948_0: u9.32cd/.bali^puruṣam api tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā ca viśīrṇavarṇa^lekhā//
S01divav33u:1949_0: u9.33ab/.apagataghṛta^varṇa^pāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
S01divav33u:1950_0: u9.33cd/.asubhṛti sadṛśā bhavet tathā bhūṣaṇa^vṛta[rūpavatī śubhā]eka^bhāryā//
S01divav33u:1951_0: u9.34ab/.bhavati bahu^dhano dhanair vihīnaḥ śrutam adhigamya viśālapāṇilekhaḥ/
S01divav33u:1954_0: u9.36/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasa^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:1957_0: u10.1cd/.jayam parājayaṃ ca^eva lābha^alābhaṃ tathā^eva ca//
S01divav33u:1960_0: u10.3ab/.devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namā namaḥ/
S01divav33u:1967_0: u10.6cd/.asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasaṃ//
S01divav33u:1970_0: u10.8ab/.rūkṣaṃ nirgharṣate tuṇḍaṃ śiraś ca parimārjati/
S01divav33u:1971_0: u10.8cd/.saphalaṃ vṛkṣam āsthāya dhruvaṃ māṃsena bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:1973_0: u10.9cd/.vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:1976_0: u10.11ab/.śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:1977_0: u10.11cd/.kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
S01divav33u:1978_0: u10.12ab/.kṣīravṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:1979_0: u10.12cd/.krameṇa yugamātreṇa na ccārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
S01divav33u:1983_0: u10.14cd/.pṛṣṭhena darśayed bhāraṃ kṣudhāpīḍāṃ ca nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:1984_0: u10.15ab/.pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
S01divav33u:1985_0: u10.15cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kuryāc cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
S01divav33u:1986_0: u10.16ab/.rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vā^api yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:1987_0: u10.16cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ śreyaś cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
S01divav33u:1988_0: u10.17ab/.gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:1989_0: u10.17cd/.kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
S01divav33u:1990_0: u10.18ab/.tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayec ca yadā khagaḥ/(p.177)
S01divav33u:1991_0: u10.18cd/.purataḥ śuṣkapāṇis tu tatra caura^bhayaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:1992_0: u10.19ab/.sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:1994_0: u10.20ab/.yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
S01divav33u:1996_0: u10.21ab/.bhītas trastaḥ parītaś ca yas tu vyāharate khagaḥ/
S01divav33u:1997_0: u10.21cd/.paribādhan diśaḥ sarvās tatra bhayam upasthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:1998_0: u10.22ab/.gacchantaṃ samanugacchet puraḥ sthitvā tu vyāharet/
S01divav33u:1999_0: u10.22cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kkuryān mārgam atra praśātanaṃ//
S01divav33u:2000_0: u10.23ab/.vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divav33u:2001_0: u10.23cd/.vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛha^svāmināṃ//
S01divav33u:2002_0: u10.24ab/.śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:2005_0: u10.25cd/.niṣaṇṇo vāśate kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:2006_0: u10.26ab/.āsane śayane vā^api sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:2010_0: u10.28ab/.brahma^sthāne niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vāśati/
S01divav33u:2011_0: u10.28cd/.sandhisthāne harec cauras tatra vai nāsti saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2017_0: u10.31cd/.yasya yasya haret tasya dravya^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2019_0: u10.32cd/.kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛham āropayanti ca/
S01divav33u:2020_0: u10.32ef/.nigadanty atra vijānīyād yācakāt tu mahā^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2021_0: u10.33ab/.nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
S01divav33u:2022_0: u10.33cd/.nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2023_0: u10.34ab/.grāmante bhayam ākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvaṃ/
S01divav33u:2024_0: u10.34cd/.pratyekato vā vāśanti vidyāt tatra mahā^bhayaṃ//
S01divav33u:2026_0: u10.35cd/.niṣīdan saphale vṛkṣe sa vaden māṃsa^bhojanaṃ//
S01divav33u:2027_0: u10.36ab/.yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:2037_0: u10.41ab/.prakāre toraṇa^agre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divav33u:2038_0: u10.41cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2039_0: u10.42ab/.maṇḍalāni vāvartāni bahir vā nagarasya ca/
S01divav33u:2040_0: u10.42cd/.vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra ca^eva vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2041_0: u10.43ab/.grāme vā nagare vā^api kurvate yatra maṇḍalaṃ/(p.179)
S01divav33u:2043_0: u10.44ab/.pūrveṇa ca^eva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:2045_0: u10.45ab/.purastād dakṣiṇe pārśve yadi sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:2046_0: u10.45cd/.varṣati prathame māse paścād devo na varṣati/
S01divav33u:2051_0: u10.47cd/.madhyamaṃ ca bhaved varṣaṃ madhya^śasyaṃ ca jāyate//
S01divav33u:2053_0: u10.48cd/.aśanir nipatet tatra bhayaṃ ca mṛgapakṣīṇāṃ//
S01divav33u:2058_0: u10.51ab/.yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
S01divav33u:2060_0: u10.52ab/.skandha^mūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:2061_0: u10.52cd/.anāvṛṣṭir bhaved ghorā durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2062_0: u10.53ab/.caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divav33u:2063_0: u10.53cd/.subhikṣaṃ ca bhavet tatra phalānām uditaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:2065_0: u10.55/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāra^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
S01divav33u:2067_0: u11.1ab/.māhendram atha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:2068_0: u11.1cd/.dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryam eva ca//
S01divav33u:2072_0: u11.3cd/.atha vai dhanmitraṃ ca paramaṃ maitram eva ca//
S01divav33u:2075_0: u11.5ab/.samaṃ syāc caturasraṃ ca vistīrṇā ca^eva mṛttikā/
S01divav33u:2078_0: u11.6cd/.rakta^pāṃśur bhaved yatra rājñāṃ tat tu praśasyate//
S01divav33u:2079_0: u11.7ab/.trikoṇaṃ kuśasaṃstīrṇam uttānaṃ madhuraṃ ca yat/
S01divav33u:2080_0: u11.7cd/.vyāyām ato jalaṃ ca^eva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//
S01divav33u:2082_0: u11.8cd/.anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktaṃ yac ca putrakṣayāvahaṃ//
S01divav33u:2083_0: u11.9ab/.yat tu kañjalakakṣais tat tyaktaṃ varṣodakena ca/(p.181)
S01divav33u:2086_0: u11.10cd/.daśa dvādaśakaṃ vaiśye śūdrasya tatra lekhanaṃ//
S01divav33u:2091_0: u11.13ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ varcaḥ sthānām anuttaraṃ/
S01divav33u:2092_0: u11.13cd/.aiśānyām eva sarvāṇi prāsādaś ca puromukhaḥ//
S01divav33u:2097_0: u11.16ab/.vidviṣasya salokasya dvāre syān nu karagrahaḥ/
S01divav33u:2098_0: u11.16cd/.mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//
S01divav33u:2101_0: u11.18ab/.puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe +apy aśubho bhavet/
S01divav33u:2102_0: u11.18cd/.śoke bhūta^vikāraḥ syāt soṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//
S01divav33u:2104_0: u11.19cd/.hrade reṇu pariśrāva āditye tu kalir dhruvaṃ//
S01divav33u:2106_0: u11.20cd/.bhaved asya ca yad dvāraṃ tatra^agni^bhayam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2107_0: u11.21ab/.kṣayaṃ vidyāt tasya tasya dhanasya ca kulasya ca/
S01divav33u:2108_0: u11.21cd/.yame mṛtyuṃ vijānīyāt kule śreṣṭha^uttamasya ca/
S01divav33u:2110_0: u11.22ab/.bhṛṅge krodhaḥ kaliś ca^eva pitari bhoga^sampadaḥ/
S01divav33u:2113_0: u11.23cd/.asurare maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahu^doṣatā//
S01divav33u:2114_0: u11.24ab/.balīṃś ca upahārāṃś ca pravakṣyāṃi yathāgṛhaṃ/
S01divav33u:2115_0: u11.24cd/.cicitrair vidiśair gandhaiḥ praipūjya baliṃ haret//
S01divav33u:2117_0: u11.25cd/.mahendre mukta^puṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//
S01divav33u:2118_0: u11.26ab/.āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ ca^eva priyaṅgavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2119_0: u11.26cd/.antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//
S01divav33u:2120_0: u11.27ab/.nandā pratipādā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
S01divav33u:2121_0: u11.27cd/.tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryāt prājño hy evaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//
S01divav33u:2123_0: u11.29/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśa^rāśikaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:2123_1: tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ / kathāyatu bhagavān triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:2128_0: u12.2cd/.dvādaśaiva tu cittās te ye loke pracaranti vai//
S01divav33u:2129_0: u12.3ab/.tān ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
S01divav33u:2130_0: u12.3cd/.dvādaśa^eva tu kuryāc ca maṇḍalāni vicakṣaṇaḥ/.
S01divav33u:2131_0: u12.4ab/.prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:2132_0: u12.4cd/.tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ ca^api karkaṭaḥ//
S01divav33u:2133_0: u12.5ab/.pañcamaṃ ca^api siṃhas tu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtaṃ/
S01divav33u:2134_0: u12.5cd/.tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikas tu tahtāṣṭamaṃ//
S01divav33u:2135_0: u12.6ab/.dnavī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:2136_0: u12.6cd/.kumbhaś caikādaśaṃ jñeyo dvādaśaṃ mīna ucyate//
S01divav33u:2137_0: u12.7ab/.horā śarīraṃ jātasya dvitīye cintitaṃ dhanaṃ/
S01divav33u:2138_0: u12.7cd/.tṛtīye bhrātura ca^eva caturthe svajanas tathā//
S01divav33u:2139_0: u12.8ab/.cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
S01divav33u:2140_0: u12.8cd/.saptame dārasaṃyogo hy aṣṭame naidhanaṃ smṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:2141_0: u12.9ab/.navame cintyate dharmo daśame darmajaṃ phalaṃ/
S01divav33u:2143_0: u12.10ab/.ete dvādaśa^cittās tu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divav33u:2145_0: u12.11ab/.āgastya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.184)
S01divav33u:2146_0: u12.11cd/.śiras tu spṛśate yaś ca śabdaś ca upalakṣyate//
S01divav33u:2147_0: u12.12ab/.vyādhitaṃ ca^eva hy ātmānam āgneyāś ca vinaṣṭayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2148_0: u12.12cd/.yadi brūyāt tadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//
S01divav33u:2149_0: u12.13ab/.kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lauhaṃ ca^eva bhṛśaṃ havet/
S01divav33u:2150_0: u12.13cd/.sa ca sarva^gataś ca^eva agnir aśnāti niścitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2152_0: u12.14cd/.yādṛśaś ca bhavec chabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2153_0: u12.15ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2154_0: u12.15cd/.grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//
S01divav33u:2155_0: u12.16ab/.yadi śabdaś ca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvas tathā^eva ca/
S01divav33u:2156_0: u12.16cd/.īdṛśaṃ ca dṛXṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:2157_0: u12.16ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//
S01divav33u:2158_0: u12.17ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2159_0: u12.17cd/.mārjayen mukhadeśaṃ tu strī^cittaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2160_0: u12.18ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśās tu te/
S01divav33u:2161_0: u12.18cd/.jātaṃ prajātam upajātaṃ tathā jāto bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:2163_0: u12.19cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2164_0: u12.20ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2165_0: u12.20cd/.kacchapaṃ spṛśate yas tu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:2166_0: u12.20ef/.svajanaṃ vyavahāras tu sati kalahe na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2167_0: u12.21ab/.ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaraṃ/(p.185)
S01divav33u:2169_0: u12.22ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya pañcamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2170_0: u12.22cd/.hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yas tu apatyaṃ tatra cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2172_0: u12.23cd/.śastra^dravyaṃ ca yat tasya brāhmaṇānaṃ kule sthitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2173_0: u12.24ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divav33u:2174_0: u12.24cd/.putraputreti yacchabdo yad gataṃ gatam eva ca/
S01divav33u:2176_0: u12.25ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2177_0: u12.25cd/.spṛśate ca^api pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//
S01divav33u:2178_0: u12.26ab/.vigrahas tu mahā^ghoraḥ śatruś ca^api pravadhyate/
S01divav33u:2179_0: u12.26cd/.atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyās te na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2180_0: u12.27ab/.ayaṃ tu prakṣaraś ca^eva hataś ca vihatas tathā/
S01divav33u:2182_0: u12.27ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2183_0: u12.28ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatāy saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2184_0: u12.28cd/.hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayed//
S01divav33u:2185_1: u12.29cd/.tatreme bhavanti śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhūmim icchatā//
S01divav33u:2185_2: u12.30ab/.sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartañ ca kṛtaṃ hasta^gataṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2187_0: u12.30ef/.yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2188_0: u12.31ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya aṣṭamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.186)
S01divav33u:2189_0: u12.31cd/.udaraṃ ca^eva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//
S01divav33u:2190_0: u12.32ab/.nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ ca^api dṛśyate/
S01divav33u:2191_0: u12.32cd/.yadi bhaved bhaven mṛtyur yaś ca^anya^priya^saṅgamaḥ//
S01divav33u:2192_0: u12.33ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
S01divav33u:2194_0: u12.34ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya navamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2195_0: u12.34cd/.ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyā dharma^cintā ca cintitā//
S01divav33u:2196_0: u12.35ab/.tatra śabdāś ca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2197_0: u12.35cd/.yaja hi yājakaś ca^eva yajamānas tathāiva ca/
S01divav33u:2199_0: u12.36ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya daśamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divav33u:2201_0: u12.37ab/.spṛśate jānunī ca^eva karma^cintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:2202_0: u12.37cd/.tatra śabdā ahbvantīme śrotavyāś ca na saṃśayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2203_0: u12.38ab/.bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathāiva ca/
S01divav33u:2205_0: u12.39ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya ekādaśaṃ tu saṃspṛśet/
S01divav33u:2206_0: u12.39cd/.jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hy artha^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
S01divav33u:2207_0: u12.40ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2209_0: u12.41ab/.etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrūtvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:2210_0: u12.41cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ phalam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2211_0: u12.42ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvādaśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.187)
S01divav33u:2212_0: u12.42cd/.pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchan cittaṃ vā^apy anarthikaṃ//
S01divav33u:2213_0: u12.43ab/.yas tu tac cintito hy artha^āśā āgantukā ca yā/
S01divav33u:2215_0: u12.44ab/.nirāśaś ca^eva ghoṣaś ca nirāśaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:2216_0: u12.44cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
S01divav33u:2218_0: u12.46/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyā^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:2218_1: tac chrūyatāṃ / atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagvāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:2219_1: u13.1ab/.tatvaṃ vijñāyate yena yena śubham upasthitaṃ/
S01divav33u:2220_0: u13.1cd/.ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ//
S01divav33u:2221_0: u13.2ab/.pitaraṃ mātaram ca^eva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2224_0: u13.3cd/.tad vijñaiḥ saha saṅgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstra^vit//
S01divav33u:2225_0: u13.4ab/.hastau pādau nirīkṣeta nakhāni hy aṅgulīs tathā/
S01divav33u:2226_0: u13.4cd/.pāṇilekhāś ca jañghae ca kaṭinābhyūrum eva ca//
S01divav33u:2227_0: u13.5ab/.oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃś ca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2228_0: u13.5cd/.akṣibhravau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃs tathā^eva ca//
S01divav33u:2229_0: u13.6ab/.romarājīṃ savaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gatim eva ca/(p.188)
S01divav33u:2231_0: u13.6ef/.tatra pūrvaṃ parīkṣeta svayam eva vicakṣaṇaḥ//
S01divav33u:2234_0: u13.8ab/.avyāvartāś catvāro yasyāḥ sarve ca^eva pradakṣiṇāḥ/
S01divav33u:2237_0: u13.9cd/.dhanyān sā janayet putrāṃs teṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//
S01divav33u:2238_0: u13.10ab/.yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhavajaḥ/
S01divav33u:2240_0: u13.10ef/.ekaṃ sā janayet putraṃ taṃ ca rājānam ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2247_0: u13.14ab/.sūkṣmā ca tuṅganāsā ca muktam āraktimodarī/
S01divav33u:2248_0: u13.14cd/.subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahu^prajā//
S01divav33u:2251_0: u13.16ab/.yasyāvartau samau snighdau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
S01divav33u:2255_0: u13.18ab/.ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
S01divav33u:2256_0: u13.18cd/.rakta^ante vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//
S01divav33u:2258_0: u13.19cd/.yukta^nāmā tu yā nārī rājānam upatiṣṭhite//
S01divav33u:2263_0: u13.22ab/.kānta^jihvā tu yā nārī rakta^uṣṭhī priya^bhāṣiṇī/
S01divav33u:2266_0: u13.23cd/.sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//
S01divav33u:2269_0: u13.25ab/.kīrtitās tu mayā dhanyā maṅgalya^lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ/
S01divav33u:2271_0: u13.26ab/.ūrdhva^prekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
S01divav33u:2278_0: u13.29cd/.trīṃś ca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patiṃ//
S01divav33u:2279_0: u13.30ab/.pārśvato roma^rājī tu vinatā ca kaṭir bhavet/
S01divav33u:2280_0: u13.30cd/.dīrgham āyur avāpnoti dīrgha^kālaṃ ca duḥkhitā//
S01divav33u:2281_0: u13.31ab/.kāka^jaṅghā ca yā nārī rakta^akṣī vardhasvarā/
S01divav33u:2282_0: u13.31cd/.niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭa^bāndhavā//
S01divav33u:2285_0: u13.33ab/.yā tu sarva^samācārā mṛd^vaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
S01divav33u:2286_0: u13.33cd/.sarvaiḥ samair guṇair yuktā vijñeyā kāma^cāriṇī//
S01divav33u:2287_0: u13.34ab/.yasyā roma^cite jaṅghe mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalaṃ/
S01divav33u:2288_0: u13.34cd/.putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā^api jāram icchati tādṛśī//
S01divav33u:2290_0: u13.35cd/.uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patiṃ//
S01divav33u:2291_0: u13.36ab/.yasya hastau ca pādāu ca chidrau danta^antarāṇi ca/
S01divav33u:2292_0: u13.36cd/.patinā^upārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//
S01divav33u:2295_0: u13.38ab/.yasyāḥ kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate +aṅguliḥ/
S01divav33u:2296_0: u13.38cd/.kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ syaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyaṃ//
S01divav33u:2298_0: u13.39cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//
S01divav33u:2301_0: u13.41ab/.āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā ca^anubandhati/(p.191)
S01divav33u:2302_0: u13.41cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patiṃ//
S01divav33u:2305_0: u13.43ab/.yasyās tu hasamānāyā gaṇḍe jāyati kūpakaṃ/
S01divav33u:2306_0: u13.43cd/.agnikārye +api sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//
S01divav33u:2307_0: u13.44ab/.sama^asama^gatā subhrūr gaṇḍa^āvartā ca ya bhavet/
S01divav33u:2308_0: u13.44cd/.pralambhoṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciraṃ//
S01divav33u:2310_0: u13.45cd/.aṣṭau bhakṣayate vīrān navame tiṣṭhate ciraṃ//
S01divav33u:2311_0: u13.46ab/.na devikā na nadikā na ca daivata^nāmikā/
S01divav33u:2313_0: u13.47ab/.nakṣatra^nāmā yā nārī yā ca gotra^sanāmikā/
S01divav33u:2314_0: u13.47cd/.suguptā rakṣitā vā^api manasā pāpām ācaret//
S01divav33u:2315_0: u13.48ab/.dārān vivarjayed etān yā mayā parikīrtitāḥ/
S01divav33u:2316_0: u13.48cd/.praśastā yās tu pūrvoktās tādṛśīyān naraḥ sadā//
S01divav33u:2319_0: u13.51/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vastra^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
S01divav33u:2319_1: tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān triśaṅkuḥ/
S01divav33u:2323_0: u14.2ab/.punarvasuś ca dhanyā syāt puṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
S01divav33u:2324_0: u14.2cd/.aśleṣāsu bhaven moṣaḥ śmaśānaṃ maghayā vrajet//
S01divav33u:2325_0: u14.3ab/.phālgunīsu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
S01divav33u:2327_0: u14.4ab/.svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priya^darśanaṃ/
S01divav33u:2330_0: u14.5cd/.uttarā mṛṣṭa^bhojī syāc chravaṇe cakṣuṣo rujaṃ//
S01divav33u:2334_0: u14.7cd/.bharaṇī ca bhaya^ākīrṇā caura^gamyā ca sā bhavet//
S01divav33u:2336_0: u14.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divav33u:2338_0: u15.1ab/.kutra^utpannā ime bījāḥ (?) śasyānāṃ ca yavādayaḥ/
S01divav33u:2339_0: u15.1cd/.yair idaṃ dhriyate viśvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sthāvara^jaṅgamaṃ//
S01divav33u:2340_0: u15.2ab/.vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalaṃ yojayet kathaṃ/
S01divav33u:2342_0: u15.3ab/.śāradaṃ vā^atha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
S01divav33u:2343_0: u15.3cd/.nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
S01divav33u:2344_0: u15.3ef/.kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//
S01divav33u:2346_0: u15.4cd/.tadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dahati citra^mukhy api//
S01divav33u:2347_0: u15.5ab/.darbha^sūcī^mukhī vā^api kāraṇaṃ tatra ko bhavet/
S01divav33u:2348_0: u15.5cd/.kati saubhikṣikā luṅgaḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divav33u:2349_0: u15.5ef/.kati varṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ kati varṇā nidarśitāḥ//
S01divav33u:2351_0: u15.6cd/.nirghāto vā bhavet tīvro +athavā^api medinī calet//
S01divav33u:2352_0: u15.7ab/.śasyaṃ phalasya kiṃ tatra nimittam upalakṣayet/
S01divav33u:2353_0: u15.7cd/.sarvam etat samāsena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ//
S01divav33u:2354_0: u15.8ab/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrūtvā triśaṅku^mātaṅga^adhipatir idaṃ vacanam abravīt/
S01divav33u:2356_0: u15.9cd/.sāgarād amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ manthite tu samudbhavaṃ//
S01divav33u:2357_0: u15.10ab/.amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/(p.194)
S01divav33u:2358_0: u15.10cd/.tato dattāḥ surair bhāgā amṛtād daśavindavaḥ//
S01divav33u:2359_0: u15.11ab/.tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi loka^sukha^āvahāḥ/
S01divav33u:2361_0: u15.12ab/.śyāmakaṃ saptamaṃ vidyād ikṣuś ca^aṣṭamakaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divav33u:2362_0: u15.12cd/.śeṣās tu saṅgatā jātā bahavaḥ śasya^jātayaḥ//
S01divav33u:2364_0: u15.13ef/.mūleṣu ca^eva sarveṣu vindur ekaḥ prapātitaḥ//
S01divav33u:2367_0: u15.15ab/.kārttike mārgaśīrṣe vā grīāma dhānyāni vāpayet/
S01divav33u:2369_0: u15.16ab/.trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
S01divav33u:2370_0: u15.16cd/.viśeṣatas tu nimneṣu sarva^bījāni hy utsṛjet//
S01divav33u:2376_0: u15.19ab/.grāma^kṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛha^devatā/
S01divav33u:2378_0: u15.20ab/.brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ kanyām arciṣmantaṃ ca pāvakaṃ/(p.195)
S01divav33u:2379_0: u15.20cd/.vāraṇa^indraṃ vṛṣaṃ ca^eva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtaṃ//
S01divav33u:2380_0: u15.21ab/.pūrṇa^kumbhaṃ dhvajaṃ chatram āmāmāṃsaṃ surāṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2381_0: u15.21cd/.uddhṛtāṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca^eva baddham eka^paśuṃ dadhi//
S01divav33u:2382_0: u15.22ab/.cakra^ārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kāka^ārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīṃ/
S01divav33u:2384_0: u15.23ab/.sarve dakṣiṇato dhanyāḥ puraś ca mṛga^pakṣiṇaḥ/
S01divav33u:2386_0: u15.24ab/.ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaś ca praśasyate/
S01divav33u:2387_0: u15.24cd/.vikṛtaṃ kubja^kuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//
S01divav33u:2390_0: u15.25ef/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
S01divav33u:2391_0: u15.26ab/.tilasya bahu(?) pūrṇasya bhāṇḍe syād vapanam tathā/
S01divav33u:2392_0: u15.26cd/.śrūtvā hy etāni vrajatāṃ sasya^sampattim ādiśet//
S01divav33u:2393_0: u15.27ab/.rāśisthaṃ grathitaṃ dhautaṃ svasthamaṃ kuritaṃ tathā/
S01divav33u:2394_0: u15.27cd/.śrūtvā saṃmārjitaṃ ca^eva ity āśukṛtinaṃ viduḥ//
S01divav33u:2395_0: u15.28ab/.śrūtvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divav33u:2396_0: u15.28cd/.śrūtvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
S01divav33u:2397_0: u15.29ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
S01divav33u:2398_0: u15.29cd/.svayam eva tu tac chasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//
S01divav33u:2399_0: u15.30ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/

S01divav33u:2560_0: u17.18/.syāt te brāhmaṇa kākṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūt/

S01divav33u:2600_7: na^evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ/ eṣā sā prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tena kālena
S01divav33u:2600_8: tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
S01divav33u:2600_9: sā etarhi (p.209) tena^eva snehena tena^eva premṇā +anandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
S01divav33u:2600_10: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tatra tatra^eva dvāre tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā +asthāt/
S01divav33u:2601_0: u17.42/.atha khalu bhagavān etasmin nidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata/
S01divav33u:2603_0: u17.43cd/.etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//
S01divav33u:2604_0: u17.44/.tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo +anabhisamitānāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām abhisamayāya,
S01divav33u:2604_2: utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādato yogaḥ caraṇīyaḥ/
S01divav33u:2604_3: drutam eṣāṃ caturṇā duḥkhasya^ārya^satyasya duḥkha^samudayanya nirodhasya nirodha^gāminyāḥ pratipada ārya^satyasya amīṣāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām
S01divav33u:2604_4: anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya^adhimātraṃ tīvra^cchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena^apramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divav33u:2605_0: u17.45/.(p.210) asmiṃś ca khalu punar dharma^paryāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭi^mātrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni/
S01divav33u:2605_1: saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnaṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigata^malaṃ dharma^cakṣur udapādi viśuddhaṃ/
S01divav33u:2606_0: u17.46/.idam avocad bhagavān/ ātta^manasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan/
